title: QSun - Vitamin D, UV Index & Sun Exposure Tracker
description:
With QSun, balance your sun exposure and vitamin D, avoid sunburns, find the current UV (ultraviolet) index, and get personal sun safety tips for healthy & young skin. QSun lets you know when it‚Äôs time to seek sun protection, and helps you prevent skin aging and skin cancer. The QSun app is already helping thousands of people worldwide enjoy a healthier life.

EXCLUSIVE FEATURES: 
‚Ä¢ Find out how much sunscreen to wear based on your size and clothes.
‚Ä¢ Scan any sunscreen‚Äôs barcode to find out if it‚Äôs right for you.
‚Ä¢ Find your skin age and skin health score with AI technology.
‚Ä¢ Track your mole with AI technology.
‚Ä¢ Track your vitamin D production from the sun, food, and supplements (Pro version).
‚Ä¢ Track the amount of your physical activity completed in safe sun conditions (Pro version).

HIGHLIGHTS:
‚Ä¢ UV map for anywhere in the world.
‚Ä¢ Current UV index & daily UV forecast.
‚Ä¢ Reminders to reapply sunscreen.
‚Ä¢ In-app quiz to determine skin type.
‚Ä¢ Monitor the time you can spend outdoors before getting a sunburn.
‚Ä¢ Monitor time until sunset or sunrise to plan for sun protection.
‚Ä¢ Find the safest time to be outside based on UV
‚Ä¢ Access 7-day, hourly, and down-to-the-minute weather forecasts.
‚Ä¢ Automatically updates weather data based on location.
‚Ä¢ English and Japanese versions available.


Use your QSun device with the QSun app to track your personal sun exposure history and access real-time UV index and temperature readings from exactly where you‚Äôre standing. The QSun app works without a QSun device, but using a QSun device makes for a more personalized experience. Using a QSun device will give you more accurate sun protection tips.

No matter your lifestyle or skin type, QSun is the perfect sun safety advisor to help you keep on top of your skin health.

Used to be a great app. Simple to use and it told you how long until you would likely burn. It has become increasingly buggy, does not respond or response slowly, does not update your location automatically and bugs you to spend money. I appreciate you need to monetise to survive, but you'd think that would mean the quality went up not down. Very disappointing.

it does work to remind you to apply sunscreen however if you have the device and sit down for a period of time in the shade it will turn off, very irritating. I would like a calculator that doesnt shut off until you tell it to. Also would be nice to be able to work offline if you are out of cell range say hiking etc.

title: Clinical Dermatology (Skin Diseases and Treatment)
description:
Clinical dermatology app is an app designed to help dermatology students and researchers understand clinical dermatology more. On Clinical dermatology app, you will find detailed explanations of different skin diseases listed below with high quality picture illustrations.

The content of clinical dermatology app is divided into 4 categories; They are:

1.	INFLAMMATORY SKIN DISEASES
‚Ä¢	Erythema Multiforme ‚Äì Definition and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Psoriasis and Other Erythematous Skin Diseases
‚Ä¢	Lupus ‚Äì Diagnosis and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Sabaceous Glands Disorders: Sebastasis, Seborrhea, Acne Vulgaris and Co.
‚Ä¢	Allergic Contact Dermatitis (ACD) ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Morphea (Localized Scleroderma) ‚Äì Symptoms and Prognosis
‚Ä¢	Bullous Pemphigoid (BP) ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Pemphigus Vulgaris (PV) ‚Äì Pathology Outlines and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Angioedema Causes and Treatment 
‚Ä¢	Ichthyosis Vulgaris ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Alopecia Areata (AA, Patchy Hair Loss) ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Lichen Planus (Lichen Ruber Planus) ‚Äì Causes and Symptoms

2.	INFECTIOUS SKIN DISEASES

‚Ä¢	Candidiasis (Yeast Infection) ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Syphilis (Treponema Pallidum)
‚Ä¢	Herpes Simplex (HSV, Herpes Simplex Virus Infection) ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Impetigo (School Sores) ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Bacterial, Viral and Fungal Infections of the Central Nervous System
‚Ä¢	Lyme Disease (Borreliosis) and Relapsing Fever ‚Äì Diagnosis and Stages
‚Ä¢	Scabies (Sarcoptic Mange) ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS) and Necrotizing Fascilitis (Flesh-eating Disease) ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Plantar Wart (Foot Wart) ‚Äì Causes and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Tinea Infections ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Folliculitis (Inflammation of Hair Follicles) ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment

3.	NEOPLASTIC SKIN DISEASES AND

‚Ä¢	Albinism (achromasia) ‚Äì Definition and Genetics
‚Ä¢	Vitiligo ‚Äì Symptoms and Treatment
‚Ä¢	Melasma (Chloasma) ‚Äì Defition and Treatment

title: Cancer Risk Calculator
description:
This application estimates your risk of cancer, subdivided into 26 types and based on 350 different risk factors described in the scientific literature. Results are displayed for 10-, 20- and 30-year timeframes, with a subdivision in anatomical or pathological subtypes if possible.

This application has the CE conformity mark as a medical device with a low risk. As such, we have followed the Class I conformity assessment procedures as described in Annex VII Module A, EC Declaration of Conformity. As it it is considered a medical device that poses minimal risk to patients and consumers, it falls under the FDA exercise enforcement discretions. For more information, please visit the relevant section the official FDA website: https://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/mobile-medical-applications/examples-mobile-apps-which-fda-will-exercise-enforcement-discretion

To use this application, create an account and enter the requested information in the different tabs as accurately and completely as you can. All information that is requested will influence your risk for at least one type of cancer, so the more complete and accurate the information you enter, the more dependable the results. Age, gender and racial background are critical, all other information is optional. The results will appear after you have completed the last tab and can always be revisited by tapping your name. You can also edit the information you submitted to see how this influences your results.

The lifetime probabilities of developing cancers were based on USA data from the National Cancer Institute's (NCI's) Surveillance, Epidemiology, and End Results (SEER) Program, collected since 1973 and by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC's) National Program of Cancer Registries (NPCR), collected since 1995. These figures were adapted by the hazard ratios available in the published peer-reviewed literature. Only risk factors with a quantifiable risk were included. Risk factors requiring complex tests not available to the average clinician were excluded. Meta-analyses were given preference when available.

DISCLAIMER: This application is strictly educational and all information contained herein cannot and should not replace assessment by a physician. The evaluations presented represent our best efforts to conveniently assess cancer risk. However, as significant controversy and widely different study results can persist around the impact of even a single variable in a strictly selected population, this is based on a large number of assumptions, extrapolations and estimates. As not every study includes a multivariate analysis and the effect of some risk factors on certain cancers is so large their effect cannot be eliminated from basic probability, a bias toward overestimation of risk is possible. Furthermore, there is continuous progress in the scientific literature. Any figures should therefore be regarded as indicative, but not precise.
Any information you enter into this application will only be stored on your device and will never be sent to us or to any other party, for any reason.

All research and medical support for this application was done by Dr. Philippe Westerlinck, radiation oncologist and clinical chair at the University Hospital of Li√®ge, superspecialising in gastro-intestinal, lung and breast cancers.

Pretty neat! I wish it would include more lifestyle and environmental factors like occupation and proximity to freeways, airports etc. but I think for a free app it is quite thorough. Well researched, cited sources, and gives recommendations on how to reduce risk. This app came recommended to me by a healthcare provider at one if the world's foremost cancer research and treatment hospitals.

-> Well designed interface -> Accurate info -> Runs quickly -> Does not take a lot of battery -> Customer service could have been better they refused to explain the link between cancer and allergies directly to me even though I indicated specifically that they could use big words.
Interesting app. The only issue I had was that I have no idea how to answer a lot of the questions - is my diet rich in selenium? No idea.
This is great! love the citations to research to explain the reasoning. And the suggestions of actions to take to lower your risk.

title: Melanoma Disease
description: Melanoma, also known as malignant melanoma, is a type of cancer that develops from the pigment-containing cells known as melanocytes. Melanomas typically occur in the skin but may rarely occur in the mouth, intestines, or eye. In women they most commonly occur on the legs, while in men they are most common on the back. Sometimes they develop from a mole with concerning changes including an increase in size, irregular edges, change in color, itchiness, or skin breakdown. The primary cause of melanoma is ultraviolet light (UV) exposure in those with low levels of skin pigment. The UV light may be from either the sun or from other sources, such as tanning devices. About 25% develop from moles. Those with many moles, a history of affected family members, and who have poor immune function are at greater risk. A number of rare genetic defects such as xeroderma pigmentosum also increase risk. Diagnosis is by biopsy of any concerning skin lesion.

title: Imagine ‚Äì Skin Condition Tracker
description:
Track and monitor your condition

The Imagine App is tailor-made for people living with skin conditions such as psoriasis, eczema, rosacea or acne to help you stay on top of your condition. The free app helps you to take consistent photos of affected areas to track the effectiveness of your treatment, so you can get a clearer view of your skin and symptoms as they change.

Use Imagine to:
‚Ä¢	Track and document your psoriasis, eczema, rosacea or acne by taking photos and rating symptoms
‚Ä¢	View changes in your skin over time with the Comparison View and Symptom Graph
‚Ä¢	Share your progress with your doctor or dermatologist
‚Ä¢	Help advance skin disease research by contributing your data
‚Ä¢	Learn about ways to cope with your skin condition from medical experts and get inspired by stories from people like you

Document and get insights
Skin conditions change gradually and it‚Äôs difficult to pinpoint what triggers flare-ups. Imagine has been developed in collaboration with patients and dermatologists to help you document your skin with consistent results, letting you track and assess your condition as it develops. By changing the way you see your skin, Imagine aims to help you find the right treatment and adjust your lifestyle to better manage your skin condition.

Use Imagine with your doctor or dermatologist
When visiting your doctor or dermatologist, you can use Imagine to show the effect of a treatment or how your condition has responded to external factors. It‚Äôs all there in the app ‚Äì clearly documented in photos and symptom ratings for your doctor to see.

Take photos and contribute to science
By using this app regularly, you are making a big difference to skin research. The anonymized data from you and thousands of others helps us better understand what impacts chronic skin development. In turn, scientific insights will power new app features to better manage your flare-ups. For example, we are currently developing an algorithm to automatically analyze photos and visualize your skin development!

Our vision
We want to help people living with chronic skin conditions such as psoriasis to take more control. Combining innovative imaging technology, machine learning and medical research, we are breaking new ground to make Imagine the most useful app for tracking, analyzing and helping you stay on top of your condition. We hope that you will join us on our ambitious journey.

About us
Imagine is a digital product from LEO Innovation Lab, a division of the LEO Foundation. The LEO Foundation supports dermatological research projects and activities, and LEO Innovation Lab develops digital solutions to improve the lives of people living with a skin condition.

Any questions, problems or feedback? Reach out to us at hello@getimagine.io or learn more on www.getimagine.io and www.leoinnovationlab.com

If you like this app, please leave a rating. We appreciate it!

Hi, I can't seem to see your FAQ or information about how to recover from a different phone.  I had signed up on my old phone (as it said do this so you don't loose anything when you change phones) which is now broken  now I have my new phone, but theres no Sign-in or restore and no easily accessible FAQ. please point me in the right direction or kindly tell me how to restore onto new phone

Very effective in tracking skin ailments.

Ive had eczema for 30 yrs. I have 2 forms of it and neither stay presented unless i have a breakout. The fact this app just lets you take photos instead of uploading them for comparison is stupid. There are 7 types of eczema and not all types remain presentnon an adults body. Please research these types and add them to your app. Otherwise this app is a waste of time. I wanted to use it to show my dermatologist the outbreaks, but nevermind now.

title: SunSafe
description:
SunSafe is an app designed by a medical student to educate and serve as a resource for sun protection and skin cancer awareness. Features include:

-	Learn about sun protection, sunscreen, and skin cancer
-	Set a reminder to reapply sunscreen
-	Check the current UV index for your location
-	Set a recurring monthly alarm to perform a skin self-exam 
-	Record and refer back to your monthly skin self-exams using pictures, notes, or both

This app is not intended to diagnose or treat any medical conditions. If you have a skin concern, please see a board-certified dermatologist.

title: DermoPico Skin
description:
A New professional system for measurement, cosmetic treatment, and recommendation of skin products.

DermoPico Skin is the most advanced range of measuring equipment, which offers fast, completely tailored service, catering to each customer's needs.

It automatically carries out a complete diagnosis of the main parameters:
For skin: Moisture, Pores, Wrinkles, Acne, Skin type

The DermoPico system uses a single device with built-in lenses. You use the DermoPico Skin sensor on its own and do not need to switch any accessories. That makes the analysis process more convenient and as fast as possible.

The system also tells you the course of treatment and products that may work best for each customer based on their analysis results.

title: üá∫üá∏Diagnosis Medical App
description:
Diagnosis Medical App is a unique project that combines medicine with computer-generated artificial intelligence designed by professional doctors from several US American university hospitals.

In the context of a simulated conversation between doctor and patient you receive questions that you can answer individually. The aim is to find a suspected diagnosis based on your given answers about your symptoms and to provide you with individual information which you will need for a possible meeting with your real doctor. Diagnosis Medical App will help you understand how your doctor analyzes your symptoms. This interactive app is designed for people with no medical expertise. 

How does this app work?

Diagnosis Medical App is driven by advanced artificial intelligence that synchronizes your symptoms with the largest existing medical data base that includes more than 1500 combinations of symptoms. Diagnosis Medical App complies with the latest scientific standards and receives updates regularly so that we can ensure that this app meets the highest medical standards. 

Try out this app to learn more about your health problems! 

FEATURES:

‚úî  Designed by professional doctors from several US American university hospitals
‚úî  Evaluation of your given information with the aim to find a suspected diagnosis
‚úî  Simulated interview between doctor and patient
‚úî  Individual questions and individual answers that fit to your symptoms
‚úî  Advanced artificial intelligence
‚úî  Largest existing medical data base with more than 1500 combinations of symptoms
‚úî  Risk assessment for several diseases that you may develop in future
‚úî  Medical advice as a preparation for your next meeting with your doctor


Diagnosis Medical App does not replace a consultation with a doctor! This app should not be treated as doctor's advice or a final diagnosis. It is meant to be used as an additional help for your meeting with a doctor.

‚úî Largest existing medical data base with more than 1500 combinations of symptoms
‚úî Risk assessment for several diseases that you may develop in future
‚úî Medical advice as a preparation for your next meeting with your doctor


Diagnosis Medical App does not replace a consultation with a doctor! This app should not be treated as doctor's advice or a final diagnosis. It is meant to be used as an additional help for your meeting with a doctor.
summary: Do you feel sick? This app could be the first move to feel better!
recentChanges:
- increased performance
- new class of disease added
comments: For stress related diagnosis which I was looking for, I truly got satisfied with the feedback I got.

I like this app a lot. But the only issue I have is that it doesn't give me very many options in the very beginning and none of them fit the description of where I am having the health issues. However I do like that the questions after the first category is fairly thorough which is nice and how it should be. I just wish it gave more category of options of health issues at the very beginning to better pin point what is wrong so I can get the correct treatment for my symptoms.

i think that this is probably the best way they could have created a free, un-official diagnosis app. i guess i'll give it 4 stars though. my only suggestion is maybe: when you get to the end of the process and it shows you your diagnosis, highlight the title of that page, or make it stand out a little more(just so i dont just click past it thinking its just another disclaimer, and have to start all over again) . either that, or let the user look at their past activity within the app itself :)

I love this app because it touches base on whats going on with your body though you should always get a second opinion from a medical dr and never try to take any kind of vitamin or drug without talking with your dr first this is a amazing app

This is an ad-grab app. The assistance it offers is bad, only supports a couple of diseases from pre-written answers. A beginner student could have made this app. It displays at least 3 ads before you get to your "diagnosis" (which was far from correct, by the way.) They claim it's artificial intelligence and that they got help from doctors, but honestly, it looks like they just googled "common diseases" and "how to make an app" and combined the search results. Absolutely horrible.

title: Mollie's Fund - Have You Checked Your Skin Lately?
description:
The Have You Checked Your Skin Lately? app from the Mollie Biggane Melanoma Foundation is a useful and potentially life-saving guide to keeping safe from the sun. 

Learn how to give yourself a monthly skin exam and how to tell if your moles are the kind that you should tell a dermatologist about. 

Keep track of your self-exams with the Monthly Skin Check Log and follow the essential tips to ensure that you are always practicing sun safety!
descriptionHTML:
The Have You Checked Your Skin Lately? app from the Mollie Biggane Melanoma Foundation is a useful and potentially life-saving guide to keeping safe from the sun.

Learn how to give yourself a monthly skin exam and how to tell if your moles are the kind that you should tell a dermatologist about.

Keep track of your self-exams with the Monthly Skin Check Log and follow the essential tips to ensure that you are always practicing sun safety!
summary: Learn to check yourself for suspicious moles and protect yourself from melanoma
recentChanges: New for Android!
comments: Years ago have had 2 odd colored, growing moles removed, both benign. I also have had 2 appointments over the last 2 years where I requested an exam, both times, she never checked my moles. Because I am a senior I wonder, do I no longer need exams?
Best & most importantly useful app EVER! It doesn't make you laugh, or spreads rumors. But it just might save your life or that of a loved one! ;)
Until better app comes out, self check and review will have to do. Free and Mollie Fund has a good cause. The features of Skin Scan app on iPhone is more for what I'm looking.
Warms my heart when people get together to serve the public interest. This app will be a life saver.
Will pressure dad to get his moles checked thank you

title: Derma AI
description: Artificial Intelligence app for skin cancer detection (melanoma). It's NOT a medical diagnosis. Any way, you should see a doctor regularly to have 100% of assurance. It was developed at Udacity Deep Learning NanoDegree 2020. This is the first version. Accuracy: 65%. Notes: small datasets provided by Udacity tend to overestimate class prediction results in AI image classification tasks. Model: Tensorflow Lite. The biggest accuracy is the first model option to be shown when there are low camera resolution, low light ambiance and bad framing. So, when this app starts, the biggest accuracy (seborrheic keratosis) will be shown first as well. For better experiences, keep the device close to skin weightlessly like added screenshots. Please, help the developer to improve it. Comment politely.

title: SkinSafe
description:
Healthy skin for every body starts with knowing what ingredients are in everyday products. Expert knowledge is now in your hands through the world‚Äôs most comprehensive skin product ingredient database brought to you by HER Inc.

By knowing exactly what‚Äôs in your products, you‚Äôre able to keep your skin free from chemicals, irritants and allergens. You should never have to suffer a bad skin day because you do not know what‚Äôs inside your everyday products. That‚Äôs SkinSAFE. 

Features: 
- Easily search and browse thousands of products safe for your skin
- Create a personalized list of your favorite products based on their ingredients
- Instantly scan your favorite products to see if they are healthy and safe for you
- Avoid the top most common allergy-causing ingredients and filter out allergens you wish to exclude
- Buy directly from retailers
- Get a Patient Allergy Code from your doctor to find products safe for your specific skin allergies

With this revolutionary piece of technology simply filter thousands of products free of allergens and discover products right for you, your skin and your lifestyle.

We rank all products based on how free they are from the top most common allergy causing ingredients identified by Mayo Clinic - we call this our Top Free score. You can also apply filters for specific ingredients you wish to avoid.
Skin. Safe. Tailored to you, and your skin.

https://www.skinsafeproducts.com/about

recentChanges:
Support for Android 9 (API level 28).
Ability to Zoom In / Zoom Out when taking product pictures.
Redesigned Product template.
comments: I really like the app and I love the idea of it, but it needs some work. The scanning feature is wonderful! I'm not sure why you can submit some products for review, but not others. The camera never gets a clear picture of the ingredients. So I'm submitting many products, but getting emails saying they can't read the ingredients. My phone camera works fine and is always clear. Also the zoom is off. Its starts out like a far away fishbowl mode and when you zoom in it never focuses properly.

What an absolute waste of time, this app could be brilliant, but it's buggy, clumsy & frustrating. I don't have time to keep logging in everytime I use the app, if & when it decides to recognise my login details. Really, there aren't enough words to describe how this app just misses the mark at every turn.

This app is helpful for basic skin sensitivity tracking, but may be difficult for those who, like me, have 5+ different chemical contact allergies (each of which usually has more than one name, making tracking or memorization hard). Was hoping to use this app to help me steer clear of products I may be allergic to, but you apparently need a Personal Allergen Code for this. And unless your doctor subscribes to this app and gives you a PAC, you can't get one or make a list on your own. :/

Omg one of the most useless apps I've ever had. Such a BRILLIANT idea, but lacks information, range of products. You don't have L'oreal?? Come on seriously? Can't input your allergens without a doctor. Unable to upload a picture of a product as its so blurry you're unable to read the ingredients. You're sitting on a amazing idea. But that's all it is. No sense of efficiency here. Don't bother downloading and wasting your time.

This app lets you search a database of almost 50,000 products to choose products that are free of allergens or unhealthy additives. Great if you have sensitive skin but can't afford to buy high-end products all the time. There are almost always a couple of very affordable products that score just as well as the expensive ones for being free of bad additives.

title: skinscopy
description:
SkinScopy system, along with a patented lens, enables you to conduct in-depth skin analysis on iOS mobile
application, allowing you to enjoy at-home reference on your skin care needs. Using advanced
image processing technology, SkinScopy effectively analyzes a magnified digial image of a
selected area of your skin. The analysis results covers such skin conditions as skin tone,
pigmentation, skin redness, sebum, pores, and wrinkles.
With SkinScopy, you can

- look into your skin condition by youself as the device gives a clear magnified picture of your
skin.
- see any changes in your skin over time as the pictures of selected skin area are automatically
stored for your future comparison.
- get professional treatment advices provided by top-notch derma scientists and skin care
specialists.
- identify your true skin type by trying to answer a set of professional questions.
- refer to real time weather information at your place, which should be helpful for your daily
makeup.

title: Skin Diseases & Treatment
description:
In this application, we have covered most skin diseases that provides a resource for people newly-diagnosed with skin-related diseases. The Skin is the most important part in the body so we need to take care of it. In Skin Disorder application, we have tried to cover most common skin related disorder with their description, causes, symptoms and treatment.

This application provides you the details about the skin disease for your references. so please read it carefully. 

Skin disorder will give you privilege to read skin related articles from skin experts into the app and app will notify about skin care tips time to time. It's a perfect app to prevent and improve skin daily.

Doctors and skin specialist can now add any other disorder and write blogs.

Features:

- Skin care articles (Blogs written by experts)
- Skin care tips (Tips by experts)
- Skin related A-Z diseases, causes, symptoms, treatment
- All human skin disorders and treatment
- Self care of Skin Disease
- Home remedies for skin care
- itchy skin problem app
- User can submit articles to use in front to 100 thousands users. 
- Skin doctors can send us missing and strange disorders and we will make it available to user after approval.

Skin infections can be bacterial skin,virus skin,cancerous,blood disease,hormonal ,fungal,sun burns,antibodies(vitiligo).
Treatments for skin disease may require blood disease test,skin surgery,skin cancer scanning and detection&brain disease scan.
Skin disease infection guidelines applications provides solutions to self diagnosis,facial skin care, ,natural home remedies and natural cures where applicable for common skin health alignments,eg.Acne is a skin condition in the human body skin spots.Acne takes away the beauty of the face and body skin beauty and cause scarring.Use medicinal drugs,natural home remedies,natural cures solutions to this skin hazards.

title: AI Eczema App: A tool to manage Eczema
description:
EczemaLess is an AI based app to provide a comprehensive management of your Eczema. 

Note: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉThis app is meant for patients who have already been diagnosed with Atopic Dermatitis (Eczema).
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉEczemaLess is a classified as Clinical Decision Support (CDS)  Software per the 21 Century Cures Act and is intended to only provide a recommendation to licensed health care professionals. It is NOT intended to be used by Patients for self diagnosis or self treatment. 

Our AI technology instantly evaluates your skin image and gives you a suggested severity rating for your Eczema. If you develop a skin rash due to Eczema flare use our tool to keep track of it and work on a care plan to assist you.

App Features
Insights:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉIntuitive insights into how the Eczema tracks over time.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack which trigger causes a spike in Eczema or the absence of which trigger will cause Eczema to settle down and your skin turn normal.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHow the various types of treatment and care regimens which you use is effective in controlling break outs.

Eczema Tracker: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack the severity of your Eczema - determine your Atopic Index
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMeasure and monitor your Quality of Life Index (POEM)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMeasure and track symptoms related to Atopic Dermatitis like Itchy skin, Dryness of skin and Sleep loss.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉUse the app to keep a picture log of your Eczema and get analytics information about the progression of Eczema

Care Plan: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉKeep track of which treatment you use and how often you use them.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSelect from various types of treatment like moisturizers, dermatitis creams, steroids, medicines and bathing routines.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGet insights into which treatment you use and how it impacts your Eczema
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDetermine which eczema treatment regimen helps cure your Eczema

Triggers: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSelect from a list of Triggers in various categories including Allergies, Environmental, Foods, Activities, Health Events, Products.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCreate your own custom trigger which you think might be causing a flare up in Eczema and start tracking.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉLoad the results from an Allergy test and use the App for tracking an elimination diet on how certain food affect the severity if Eczema.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉEnvironmental Triggers like Pollen count, UV Index, Humidity, Air Quality and Temperature are automatically logged when a user Tracks their Eczema severity.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack which allergen or irritant is causing Contact Dermatitis.

Type of by default Triggers in our app consists of
o	Allergies [pets, dust, mold, pollen, grasses]
o	  Environmental [heat, cold, air conditioning, sweat, sun]
o	  Foods [dairy, soy, wheat/gluten, oats, shellfish, fish, peanuts, tree nuts, legumes, eggs]
o	  Activities [sports, hobbies, housework, hand washing]
o	  Health Events [recent illness, asthma exacerbation, allergy attack, school or work stress]
o	  Products [detergent, soap, wool, synthetic fabrics, rough fabrics, tight clothing, scented products]

All these features are available for free.

What makes us Unique?

While undergoing treatment for Atopic Dermatitis, it is very important for the individual to track his / her activities and treatment actions to ensure that the Care-plan which s/he is following is effective. EczemaLess allows users to track their Eczema, users can also share the information with their Doctors. 

Get insights on how your Eczema, trends, over a period of time and how various triggers exacerbate the problem and which treatment regimen helps. Compare your current condition with the previous using graphs and check different parameters in the same period.

Generate Summary report about how your Eczema has been doing, you can decide to share this with your Dermatologist who can determine if you are a candidate for Biologics or other prescription treatment options.

I think it is a very usefull and great application. will you translate it in french ? (It could be easier to do it everyday in french :-) )

Absolutely love this app! It's great at keeping track of our infant son's triggers and daily routine. The charts and graphs help us to with trying to identify any new triggers. Would recommend it to anyone suffering with eczema.
Love love love this app! Super helpful and always reminds me of my progress!
This app is helpful. I was suffered by eczema a few days ago. This app helped me a lot to track the severity of eczema of my skin. I am recomemding this app to use for eczema issues.

title: Know about CANCER Disease
description: Cancer, also called malignancy, is an abnormal growth of cells. There are more than 100 types of cancer, including breast cancer, skin cancer, lung cancer, colon cancer, prostate cancer, and lymphoma. Symptoms vary depending on the type. Cancer treatment may include chemotherapy, radiation, and/or surgery. This app contained information about cancer disease and its treatment.

title: Mary Kay¬Æ Skin Analyzer
description:
NEW! Now available for customers to use in conjunction with their Mary Kay Independent Beauty Consultant. Thanks for supporting a small business! 

Mary Kay¬Æ Skin Analyzer is a tool that brings skin care and technology together at your fingertips.

title: UVLens - UV Index Forecasts

Exposure to sunlight‚Äôs ultraviolet radiation (UV) can damage to your skin, cause sunburn and increase your risk of skin cancer. UVLens shows you when you need to take care and when you can safely enjoy the sun.  

Features:
‚Ä¢ Plan out the best time to be outside
See the UV index forecast for the day, see when it‚Äôs safe to be outside and when to avoid the sun.

‚Ä¢ Find your burn risk
Find out how long you can spend in the sun without sunscreen by taking a personalized skin type assessment.

‚Ä¢ Sunscreen Reminder

title: Indigo Dermatology
description:
At Indigo Dermatology we pride ourselves on timely patient access and superior patient care. Due to the increasing incidence of skin cancer in our country, it is paramount that patients schedule appointments to see their dermatologist in order to identify skin cancer early. Many groups leave the majority of patient care to physician extenders such as Physician Assistants and Nurse Practitioners.


We use advanced dermoscopy to evaluate moles clinically and may perform a skin biopsy if a lesion is concerning. If you have any new or changing lesions, please don‚Äôt hesitate and schedule your initial visit today.

title: Skin Disease Treatment Symptoms and Diagnosis 2019
description:
Skin Disease Treatments provides medical treatments info including rosacea. 
People say that beauty‚Äôs only skin deep; it‚Äôs what‚Äôs on the ‚Äúinside‚Äù that counts. Our insides are certainly important, but skin treatment is your first layer of defense against the outside world. Skin can also give important clues to your overall health. Learn to take good care of your skin, so your skin can keep taking good care of you. 
Skin protects your body in many ways. The skin provides a barrier to protect the body from invasion by bacteria and other possible environmental hazards that can be dangerous for human health.

Skin can also alert you to a health problem. A red, itchy rash might signal allergies or skin diseases, and a red ‚Äúbutterfly‚Äù rash on your face might be a sign of lupus. A yellow tint might indicate liver disease. And dark or unusual moles might be a warning sign of skin cancer. Be on the lookout for unexpected changes to your clear skin, and talk with your skin doctor if you have concerns.

Your skin can become too dry if you don‚Äôt drink enough fluids or spend too much time in sunny or dry conditions. While washing hands is important for good hygiene, washing your hands too much can also lead to dry skin.

The sun can damage your skin as well. Sunlight contains ultraviolet (UV) light that causes sunburn and makes your skin age faster, leading to more wrinkles as you get older. There‚Äôs a strong link between UV exposure and skin cancer. So protect your skin from the sun. Wear hats and other protective clothing, use sunscreen with a sun protection factor (SPF) of at least 30, and restrict your time in the sun during the late morning and early afternoon hours, when sunlight is strongest.

Many skin researchers are studying the skin‚Äôs microbiome‚Äîthe bacteria and other microscopic organisms that live on your skin. Some of these microbes can be helpful. Evidence suggests that they boost the body‚Äôs infection-fighting immune system and help keep you healthy. But there are some skin diseases with known associations with certain microbes. In the long run, scientists would like to find ways to support healthy skin microbes while reducing harmful ones.

The importance of keeping your skin healthy can't be overemphasized. It's the body's first defense against disease and morgellons, and it protects your internal organs from injuries. It is, in fact, the largest organ in the body. The skin helps regulate body temperature and prevents excess fluid loss, and it also helps your body remove excess water and salt.

Skin conditions can affect anyone‚Äîyoung and old, men and women. Acne, hyperhidrosis and eczema are just a few examples of common skin disorders. The good news is that there are soap notes and a number of simple ways to keep skin healthy, and there also are now many options available to treat skin conditions, if treatment is necessary.

Disclaimer : If you think you may have a skin problem or need to learn how to better care for your skin, consultation with a dermatologist‚Äîa physician who specializes in treating the skin and keeping it healthy‚Äîmay be in order. Don‚Äôt use this guide for main diagnose medical books. Skin problems can be difficult to diagnose because many skin conditions share similar symptoms. An evaluation is key to effective treatment.

title: Outcomes4Me - Breast Cancer Care
description:
Outcomes4Me is the most essential and trusted app in helping breast cancer patients navigate their care. Simply download the app and answer a few questions in regards to your cancer history. Based on your medical records, we will then supply you with personalized tools and resources that you need to get the best outcome possible.

Outcomes4Me Featured Tools & Resources:
‚Ä¢ Personalized Treatment Path ‚Äì get a snapshot of recommended treatment options, drug information, and procedure alternatives based on your medical records history.
‚Ä¢ Clinical Trial Matching ‚Äì get matched with clinical trials that are relevant to you and around your desired location.
‚Ä¢ Symptom Management & Tracking ‚Äì monitor how your medication and therapies are making you feel and track your progress towards improved health.
‚Ä¢ Consolidated Medical Records ‚Äì we will track down and consolidate all your medical records into one report that is easy to read and understand.
‚Ä¢ Curated Cancer News Content ‚Äì personalized news content surrounding your breast cancer diagnosis, insurance, policies, and much more.
‚Ä¢ Second Opinions ‚Äì ask our team a question based on how you‚Äôre feeling for support and guidance to better manage your care.
‚Ä¢ Validated External Resources ‚Äì our resources section provides you with additional vetted information on genomics, specialized cases, and guidance from The American Society of Breast Cancer, the NCCN, the CDC, ASCO, WHO, and more.

How Outcomes4Me Works:
The data shows that empowered patients have better outcomes. Outcomes4Me supplies you with personalized tools and information to navigate your cancer care based on your medical records. Outcomes4Me has a dedicated team of healthcare and software professionals who have joined forces to give breast cancer patients the simplest, most accurate, most helpful information and tools based on their medical records and the most up-to-date NCCN Guidelines in this all-in-one breast cancer app. 

Why Outcomes4Me:
‚Ä¢ Outcomes4Me is the only app fully integrated with NCCN Guidelines that provides you with personalized treatment options based on your specific breast cancer diagnosis
‚Ä¢ 7 days of symptom tracking is all it takes before you start to see trends and results that can make you feel better
‚Ä¢ No additional appointments, no added bills, this app is 100% free and always will be
‚Ä¢ Privacy guaranteed. Secure and HIPAA compliant.

Outcomes4Me is the essential breast cancer app and the only app that can give you evidence-based treatment recommendations personalized to your cancer diagnosis. Download Outcomes4Me today and join our community of members helping us on our mission to empower patients with understandable, relevant, and evidence-based information surrounding their cancer diagnosis. Take control over your breast cancer with this all-in-one app.

Instead of carrying printed documents, this is very convenient and safer as you can store all the info in your phone and lock it. This app jus launched last Fri.

This app is awesome! it walk you through the process, gives you relavent articles to your case and shows you clincal trials close to your address. this is a one-stop shop for breast cancer patients and it helps patient who have no clue what to do next.

The information that this app provides is truly amazing! As a nurse, I know how valuable this information can be for a patient, their family and care team. Having all the information to make an informed decision at their fingertips is priceless!

All breast cancer is NOT carcinoma. This doesn't address the diagnosis. It doesn't account for adoptees. It does seem hungry to get your medical records. Not worth the time it takes to dowload. Uninstalling!

title: Skintastic Beauty
description:
Dr Hussain is an experience GP who is a fellow of the Royal Australian College of General Practitioners, his special interests are skin cancer and cosmetic medicine.

Dr Hussain is a trained aesthetic physician he is Board Certified from the American Academy of Aesthetic Medicine -USA.(AAAM)
and has a Diploma of Aesthetic Medicine from the American Academy of Aesthetic Medicine -USA.(AAAM)
We only use the premium products for our antiwrinkle treatments and fillers with the aim of providing the best results for our patients.
We also have facilities for PRP -popularly known as Vampire Facials for rejuvenation and hair loss.
Dr Hussain also provides sclerotherapy for varicose veins.
Dr Hussain is a qualified skin care physician as well, with Advance Training in Skin Cancer Medicine and Surgery  and Dermoscopy  with  the Skin Cancer College of Australia .
We are an accredited facility with the Skin Cancer College of Australia for skin cancer care.

title: War On Cancer: Find Others That Can Relate
description:
War On Cancer is the largest free social media app for everyone affected by cancer. War On Cancer is a social network and community where we can connect and find new friends, learn from others and share our experience with cancer. The War On Cancer app improves the mental health of everyone and anyone affected by cancer. On the app you‚Äôll be able to connect with people from all over the world with different types of diagnosis, including: breast cancer, head and neck cancer, lung cancer, skin cancer, blood cancer, bowel cancer, and bone cancer. This is the social network where your stories and experiences can make others feel better. A place where sharing your experience helps make others feel like they belong. A community where you‚Äôre never alone because we are fighting cancer together. A place to make new friends and connect with others that understand what you are going through. 

Share notes, pictures, images, experiences. Send personal or group messages to other storytellers. Learn about and follow cancer influencers or become one by sharing your story.

The app contains the following features to help improve your mental health while going through cancer:


* Process and heal by sharing your own story through text and images
* Find and follow others affected by cancer and give your support
* Exchange experiences by asking and answering questions
* Send private messages to people and groups
* Find others that have similar experiences through our Explore feature
* Follow specific topics that you‚Äôre interested in 

This is the social media app where it is normal and okay to talk about cancer and:


* Depression and mood swings
* Anxiety and anxiety relief
* Side-effects
* Managing emotions
* Mindfulness and gratefulness
* Diet and health
* Communication around cancer
* Motivation
* Social interactions
* Day-to-day life experiences
* Inspirations 
* Interests and hobbies 
* Life and coping 
* Health and diet 

War On Cancer is led by cancer patients; as well as their loved ones, friends and colleagues. We have partnered with policy-makers, business leaders, health care professionals and other brands. Despite having different and diverse backgrounds, we have aligned ourselves through our determination to improve the cancer experience for everyone and anyone affected by it. We believe that talking about our experience with cancer is a vital part of improving mental health of cancer patients. We would love for you to join us.

Download War On Cancer today and share your story with the world.
descriptionHTML:
War On Cancer is the largest free social media app for everyone affected by cancer. War On Cancer is a social network and community where we can connect and find new friends, learn from others and share our experience with cancer. The War On Cancer app improves the mental health of everyone and anyone affected by cancer. On the app you‚Äôll be able to connect with people from all over the world with different types of diagnosis, including: breast cancer, head and neck cancer, lung cancer, skin cancer, blood cancer, bowel cancer, and bone cancer. This is the social network where your stories and experiences can make others feel better. A place where sharing your experience helps make others feel like they belong. A community where you‚Äôre never alone because we are fighting cancer together. A place to make new friends and connect with others that understand what you are going through.

Share notes, pictures, images, experiences. Send personal or group messages to other storytellers. Learn about and follow cancer influencers or become one by sharing your story.

The app contains the following features to help improve your mental health while going through cancer:


* Process and heal by sharing your own story through text and images
* Find and follow others affected by cancer and give your support
* Exchange experiences by asking and answering questions
* Send private messages to people and groups
* Find others that have similar experiences through our Explore feature
* Follow specific topics that you‚Äôre interested in

title: Metasense
description:
METASENSE has developed a portable device (SafeSpot) and METASENSE software platform, which helps minimize the likelihood of skin cancer. It helps organizations better manage occupational health risks. 

It is already well acknowledged that much of the mortality due to cancer is associated with the late diagnosis, where clinical and pharmacologic treatments are less effective. A significant number of people including outdoor workers are at mid to high-risk levels of skin cancer; of which they are not aware, and that leads to their elevated risk as each day goes by. Real-time monitoring of the workers UV exposure followed by relevant and automatic safety recommendations are required in Australian and global workforce. By employing the SafeSpot and METASENSE Analytics platform, we will manage and prevent cumulative sunburn and skin cancer at an early stage. 
FEATURES:
-	Daily UV forecast and access 24/7
-	Automatically measure the UV index of the employees via SafeSport (portable device) on location.
-	Send the reminders to employee‚Äôs mobile phone if the UV index reaches to the limit.
-	Send the notifications to the manager via METASENSE software platform to control UV exposure of the employees
-	Tracking data and give comprehensive analysis of UV risks for each employee in each area.
-	English version available
BENEFITS:
‚Ä¢	EMPLOYEES:
- Preventing the sunburn, elevated awareness and compliance rate, and reducing the likelihood of skin cancer
- Personalized risk profiling for UV dose
‚Ä¢	ENTERPRISES:
- Reduce the cost of premium insurance
- Safer work environment and smarter duty of care
- Timely and cost-effective UV risk assessment
‚Ä¢	INSURANCE:
- Reduce related claims and increase profitability
- More appropriate insurance policies

More information: http://www.metasense.com.au

title: Melanoma Info
description:
Melanoma, also known as malignant melanoma, is a type of cancer that develops from the pigment-producing cells known as melanocytes.[1] Melanomas typically occur in the skin but may rarely occur in the mouth, intestines or eye (uveal melanoma).[1][2] In women, they most commonly occur on the legs, while in men they most commonly occur on the back.[2] About 25% of melanomas develop from moles.[2] Changes in a mole that can indicate melanoma include an increase in size, irregular edges, change in color, itchiness or skin breakdown.[1]

The primary cause of melanoma is ultraviolet light (UV) exposure in those with low levels of the skin pigment melanin.[2][7] The UV light may be from the sun or other sources, such as tanning devices.[2] Those with many moles, a history of affected family members and poor immune function are at greater risk.[1] A number of rare genetic conditions such as xeroderma pigmentosum also increase the risk.[8] Diagnosis is by biopsy and analysis of any skin lesion that has signs of being potentially cancerous.[1]

The primary cause of melanoma is ultraviolet light (UV) exposure in those with low levels of the skin pigment melanin.[2][7] The UV light may be from the sun or other sources, such as tanning devices.[2] Those with many moles, a history of affected family members and poor immune function are at greater risk.[1] A number of rare genetic conditions such as xeroderma pigmentosum also increase the risk.[8] Diagnosis is by biopsy and analysis of any skin lesion that has signs of being potentially cancerous.[1]
summary: A guide on Melanoma covering signs and symptoms, prevention & treatment.

With the IONIQ App we offer you, your personal skin care consultancy! The App is helping you to achieve your skin care goals and offers a faithful companion in all matters around your skin, with a UV weather forecast, sun screen application reminder and SPF recommendation, personalized News and many more features as well as all information and tools to manage your IONIQ One!

Our patented Magnetic Skin Technology* works through attraction between the skin and the liquid. Skin care products will be sprayed homogeneously and streak-free onto your skin.

With IONIQ one you can quickly spray skin care products to every part of your body without the need to rub it in ‚Äì even your back. No sticky hands anymore and ready to go in seconds.

Spraying skin care products without rubbing in assures you the quickest and most efficient way to care for your whole body. Your skin will be perfectly covered without having to inhale spray mist and losing much fluid.

comments: They tried to make it a companion app to a Bluetooth paired body sprayer. However, the app on its own does not seem to have much use. Apart from some copywriting issues, they need to make sure they have a solid USP before pushing it out to the market. App is snappy and loads fast and graphics are aesthetically pleasing.

Very good app, have not seen or used anything like this before, shame this wasnt out earlier in the year as I burnt a few times over the summer this year and an app of this nature would have been a life saver instead of trawling through various reviews of different SPF products trying to find ones that were fairly decent.

Easy to use app that helps you to identify your skin type and potential reasons why you could be suffering from certain complaints. Includes a calendar to add reminders for your skin care routine as well as a weather app that works by location and recommends what type of sunscreen would be most appropriate and needed to match the weather. Cool little app with some interesting articles. Worth a look I was impressed

This is a great little app to educate about skin/sun care and includes useful personalised advice after completing a simple questionnaire. The today/weather feature helpfully gives weather forecast and UV information and the newsfeed can be tailored to your travel preferences too. The app has been designed to be used in conjunction with the ioniq sunscreen sprayer but you don't need to have it to benefit.

I was suprised by this app. It's really nice and easy to use. I loved the features and also that I can customise the skincare to me. My favourite feature has to be the today tab, I love being able to customise it to my area and it gave me the suggested SPF. That's is so brilliant.

title: Mouth Cancer
description: Oral cancer, also known as mouth cancer, is a type of head and neck cancer and is any cancerous tissue growth located in the oral cavity. It may arise as a primary lesion originating in any of the tissues in the mouth, by metastasis from a distant site of origin, or by extension from a neighboring anatomic structure, such as the nasal cavity. Alternatively, the oral cancers may originate in any of the tissues of the mouth, and may be of varied histologic types: teratoma, adenocarcinoma derived from a major or minor salivary gland, lymphoma from tonsillar or other lymphoid tissue, or melanoma from the pigment-producing cells of the oral mucosa. There are several types of oral cancers, but around 90% are squamous cell carcinomas, originating in the tissues that line the mouth and lips. Oral or mouth cancer most commonly involves the tongue. It may also occur on the floor of the mouth, cheek lining, gingiva (gums), lips, or palate (roof of the mouth). Most oral cancers look very similar under the microscope and are called squamous cell carcinoma, but less commonly other types of oral cancer occur, such as Kaposi's sarcoma.

A disease caused by an out-of-control division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.
A nasty growth or tumors resulting from an uncontrolled distribution of cells.
An evil or destructive practice or phenomenon that is hard to contain or eradicate.
A disease that effects when cells changes causes the uncontrolled growth and division of cells.
Cancer is surrounded by the mainly familiar causes of casualty in adult males in the U.S. While a healthy starve yourself can lower the hazard of developing convinced cancers, other factors like genes can play a larger role. Once cancer spreads, it can be easier said than done to treat.

title: Skin infections guide
description:
There are bacterial skin infections that are both common and uncommon in humans. It's useful to be able to identify such infections in others, whether you are seeking to help them in the absence of medical resources, or if you simply want to avoid becoming infected yourself. If you spot these symptoms in a person, you may be able to direct them to a medical professional who can help them, or at least give them a possible diagnosis for their ailment.

title: Cancer Symptom & Treatment Tracker
description:
Cancer Symptom Tracker allows you to track your cancer symptoms and treatment side effects so you can better manage your cancer and improve your quality of life. 

Share your progress and data with your doctor or care team, so they too can help you achieve better outcomes.

EASY TO RECORD YOUR SYMPTOMS
Use simple faces to describe how you feel.

EASY TO TRACK PROGRESS
Intuitive charts show how your cancer symptoms are trending.

EASY TO SHARE WITH YOUR DOCTOR
A few clicks to quickly share your data with your doctor. 

SIMPLE‚Ä¶ IT DOESN‚ÄôT INTERRUPT YOUR DAY
When it‚Äôs simple, managing your cancer becomes achievable.

START CREATING HEALTHY HABITS

Clinical studies have shown that tracking your symptoms regularly is one of the healthiest habits you can adopt, and by sharing cancer symptoms with your care team or doctor, you can take control of your cancer journey, experience a greater quality of life and live longer.

To do this, Cancer Symptom Tracker provides you with easy to use Healthy Habit daily reminders, so you never forget to track your symptoms.

ACHIEVE BETTER OUTCOMES

Whether you have been recently diagnosed, are in treatment or beyond, this free cancer symptom and treatment tracker app provides you with simple, yet powerful tools to help you improve your quality of life.

By simply taking a short moment to check-in on how you‚Äôre feeling each day, and sharing key symptom data with your oncologist, doctor or cancer care team, clinical trials have shown that you really can achieve better outcomes.

DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY

Start tracking your symptoms today and take control of your cancer journey.


*** PLEASE NOTE THIS APP DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE ***

Cancer Symptom Tracker does not recommend or endorse any specific tests, physicians, products, procedures, opinions or other information that may be mentioned on Cancer Symptom Tracker. 

The information, including but not limited to, text, graphics, images and other material contained on Cancer Symptom Tracker are for informational purposes only. This app is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.

** WHO IS THIS FOR? **

Anyone living with cancer and is receiving cancer treatments such as chemotherapy, radiotherapy, cancer support from their oncologist or health care provider, or has received TNM staging and is looking to manage or beat cancer.

If you‚Äôre suffering from any type of cancer such as breast cancer, skin cancer, lung cancer, ovarian cancer, prostate cancer, colon cancer, brain tumor, leukemia etc. and are looking for a better way to track and manage your symptoms or side effects, and move towards a happier, healthier life, then this app will help you do that.

title: iDoc24 - Dermatology Online
description:
iDoc24 is an award-winning online dermatology service backed by scientific research, with over 20,000 skin concerns answered.

Featured on Wired, CNET, USA Today and Forbes, iDoc24 is one of the oldest and largest online dermatology groups, serving 160+ countries in 7 languages. Our online dermatologists are board-certified, vetted, and trained in teledermatology. 

Get an expert answer on your skin concern anywhere, anytime, anonymously. Starting at $29.95.

RESEARCH-BACKED ‚Äì iDoc24‚Äôs technology is backed by 4 peer-reviewed scientific papers and in hospitals.

8-HOUR, 24-HOUR and 48-HOUR RESPONSE TIME GUARANTEED - iDoc24 responds within hours. 24/7 online customer support.

BOARD-CERTIFIED DERMATOLOGISTS ‚ÄìDermatologists on iDoc24 are board-certified with over 10 years of specialized training at top medical institutions and vetted by a senior medical advisory board.

100% ANONYMOUS ‚Äì No registration needed. User data is always kept anonymous, encrypted, and on secure servers.

SHARE YOUR ANSWER AND JUMP THE QUEUE ‚Äì 70% of our users get better with over-the-counter medication. For more serious cases, iDoc24 ¬≠recommends a face-to-face with a dermatologist. Use the app to find a dermatologist, pediatrician and pharmacy near you. With an answer from iDoc24, our users see a dermatologist two weeks faster than the US average of 32 days.

Common concerns include:
‚Ä¢ Acne
‚Ä¢ Eczema
‚Ä¢ Folliculitis (ingrown hair)
‚Ä¢ Hives
‚Ä¢ Bug bites and insect bites
‚Ä¢ Hair loss, alopecia
‚Ä¢ Skin cancer, moles, changing moles, melanoma, actinic keratosis
‚Ä¢ Cold sores, fever blisters, herpes simplex virus
‚Ä¢ Rosacea

‚Ä¢ Dry skin, chapped skin
‚Ä¢ Psoriasis
‚Ä¢ Wrinkles and anti-aging skin care
‚Ä¢ STD (sexually transmitted disease) / STI (sexually transmitted infection)

Disclaimer
Answers provided by iDoc24 dermatologists are for informational purposes only to give you peace of mind and what to do next, since you are anonymous, it does not create a physician-patient relationship, and is not a diagnosis or a treatment plan.

title: Itchy Skin Causes, Treatment and Home Remedies
description:
Itchy skin can be the result of rash or other skin condition. It can also be a symptom of a more serious condition such as liver disease or kidney failure. This app as skin advisor for skin disease and information for skin problems and treatment. Skin disorder that are describes like scabies, zoster, herpes and eye diseases. Itch is a sensation that causes the desire or reflex to scratch. 

Modern science has shown that itch has many similarities to pain, and both are unpleasant sensory experiences, their behavioral response pattern are different. You can find answers of many questions about itching like: 
Can itchy skin be a sign of something serious?
How can I stop itching all over my body?
What cancer can cause itchy skin? 
Many reasons why your skin itches uncontrollably and how to get relief?

Features
This exclusive app will help you to understand the itching guide, itching disease causes and itching disease management.
Data of app is collected from various research report.
Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family members.

title: DermaPhoto by Skinzy: Skin Disease Prediction
description:
As a by-product of crowded places, pollution and busy lifestyles, contraction of skin diseases have become a common thing. But we at Skinzy believe that long-term damage through these diseases shouldn‚Äôt be a common thing. So we have developed the DermaPhoto app.
We have conducted clinical investigations as well as clinical trials for all the skin diseases and obtained Ethics committee approvals before presenting the results via DermaPhoto App. The app can predict probable diseases and hence save a lot of your time. This easy to use app conveniently predicts up to 17 skin diseases that you may be suffering from. These results can then be referred to by doctors for quicker as well as more accurate diagnosis of skin diseases. 

The 17 diseases are:
Acanthosis Nigricans
Acne Corporis
Bullous Pemphigoid
Cherry Angioma
Eczema
Furuncle
Keratosis Pilaris
Melasma
Nail Psoriasis
Onychomycosis
Prurigo Nodularis
Psoriasis Regular
Psoriasis Palmoplantar
Psoriasis Plaque
Tinea
Vitiligo
Warts



Apart from the 17 diseases, DermaPhoto detects Acne and its types as well. So go ahead and scan your skin now!

All you need to do is upload the photograph of the affected area. This photograph will be analyzed and the results will be displayed. The photograph uploaded will be transferred, and stored in a database, which will furnish a reference framework for future research. You can rest assure about your privacy because we do not share any part of our database.

How to use the app:
1. Open the DermaPhoto app.
2. Login using your Google account.
3. For users logging in for the first time, a few details are required to be entered.
4. After successfully logging in, disclaimer and important terms and conditions are displayed that you need to agree with, to proceed further.
5. Now you will be given two options, to either capture an image from the camera or to upload an image from the gallery. A reading material is also provided to get more information about various skin diseases.
6. If you capture an image from the camera, only a single image is captured and uploaded. If you upload from gallery, multiple images can be selected and uploaded at once.
7. Next, crop the uploaded image/ images. Please refer to the guidelines of cropping images for accurate results.
8. Next, you need to specify various parameters of the affected area of the disease and click on Get Results.
9. After submitting, the top results of diseases will be displayed with their percentages.
10. You can click on any result to see the description of that disease. If you want the description in Hindi, use the translate to Hindi toggle switch above.
10. You can then give your feedback on the current report that was generated for you.
11. There is also a facility in the App to consult a Skin Specialist /Doctor for a confirmatory diagnosis.


Accuracy:
The average accuracy of disease classification in our model is 93.69% with a minimum individual disease classification accuracy of 90%

Permissions:
Camera
Push Notifications
Location


DISCLAIMER: THIS APP IS FOR AIDING DOCTORS ONLY. IT DOES NOT REPLACE A DERMATOLOGIST. THE RESULTS OBTAINED ARE FOR REFERENCE PURPOSES ONLY AND DO NOT INDICATE SEVERITY. WE WOULD RECOMMEND YOU TO VISIT A DOCTOR IF A DISEASE IS PREDICTED WITH A HIGH PROBABILITY.
For more information visit: http://www.skinzy.in/

title: Fitzpatrick's Dermatology, 9th Edition, 2-Vol. Set
description:
The gold-standard text in dermatology, completely updated for today's practice by an all-new editorial board

Encyclopedic in scope, yet skillfully edited to make it easy to read and understand, this trusted classic delivers everything clinicians need to know about skin, skin symptoms, and skin diseases. Presented in full color, Fitzpatrick's covers all the essentials, from the basic science of skin to the day-to-day clinical issues of managing common skin disorders such as acne, skin cancer, and psoriasis. Backed by the expertise of more than 500 world-renowned contributors, and the reference of choice for clinicians, students, and educators, Fitzpatrick's  is enhanced by thousands of full-color photographs and a wealth of newly enhanced tables and diagrams.

The Ninth Edition is bolstered by a new global editorial team; a reorganized table of contents; a more simple, readable, and direct writing style, the incorporation of more genetic, syndromic, and treatment information into each chapter; the addition of first, second, and third line treatment options; and improved table presentation. The reorganized table of contents reflects how disease presents rather than its cause.

This app is very intuitive and easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for topics. The powerful search tool gives you word suggestions that appear in the text as you type, so it is lightning fast and helps with spelling those long medical terms. The search tool also keeps a recent history of past search terms so you can go back to a previous search result very easily. You have the ability to create notes and bookmarks separately for text, images and tables to enhance your learning. You can also change the text size for easier reading.

After the app has been downloaded, no internet connection is needed to retrieve the content of the app. All of the text and images are available to you on your device anytime, anywhere, and lightning fast. This app is also automatically optimized for whatever size device you are currently using, either phone or tablet. 

This interactive app is based on the full content of Fitzpatrick's Dermatology, Ninth Edition, 2-Volume Set by McGraw-Hill Education.

Editors:
SEWON KANG, MD, MPH
MASAYUKI AMAGAI, MD, PhD
ANNA L. BRUCKNER, MD, MSCS
ALEXANDER H. ENK, MD
DAVID J. MARGOLIS, MD, PhD
AMY J. McMICHAEL, MD
JEFFREY S. ORRINGER, MDH


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: Color Atlas of Skin Diseases - Dermatology Atlas
description:
This app Color Atlas of Skin Diseases - Dermatology Atlas is for medical student, doctors, dermatologist, nurses and other health practitioners to understand Dermatology Atlas with Treatment. The cases contain pictures (Zoom in/Out of illustrated color images), etiology and treatment of many skin infections.

Contents of this app:

1. Introduction To Dermatology : Dermatology is the medical science of disorders of the skin. Often skin lesions and disorders are markers of internal disease and mirror the processes occurring within the body.

2. History Taking

3. Acne Vulgaris : Acne, also known as acne vulgaris, is a long-term skin disease that occurs when hair follicles are clogged with dead skin cells and oil from the skin.

4. Alopecia Areata : Alopecia areata, also known as spot baldness, is a condition in which hair is lost from some or all areas of the body.

5. Bacterial Infections : The most common are Staphylococcus and Streptococcus. Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (also known as MRSA) is now the most common pathogen causing skin infections in the United States.

6. Drug Eruptions : In medicine, a drug eruption is an adverse drug reaction of the skin.

7. Eczema : Eczema is a condition where patches of skin become inflamed, itchy, red, cracked, and rough. The word "eczema" is also used specifically to talk about atopic dermatitis, the most common type of eczema.

8. Fungal Infections : Yeast infections of the skin are called cutaneous candidiasis and are caused by yeast-like fungi called candida.

9. Leprosy : Leprosy is a chronic, progressive bacterial infection caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium leprae.

10. Lichen Planus : Lichen planus (LIE-kun PLAY-nus) is an inflammatory condition that can affect the skin, hair, nails and mucous membranes. On the skin, lichen planus usually appears as purplish, often itchy, flat-topped bumps, developing over several weeks.

11. Lupus Erythematosus : Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), also known simply as lupus, is an autoimmune disease in which the body's immune system mistakenly attacks healthy tissue in many parts of the body.

12. Parasitic Infections : Parasitic Infections of the Skin.

13. Pityriasis Rosea : Pityriasis rosea: This common skin disease causes patches on the skin. Pityriasis rosea (pit-uh-rahy-uh-sis row-zee-ah) is a common skin disease that causes a rash.

14. Psoriasis : Psoriasis is a common skin condition that speeds up the life cycle of skin cells. It causes cells to build up rapidly on the surface of the skin. The extra skin cells form scales and red patches that are itchy and sometimes painful.

15. Urticaria : Urticaria, also known as hives, is an outbreak of swollen, pale red bumps or plaques (wheals) on the skin that appear suddenly -- either as a result of the body's reaction to certain allergens, or for unknown reasons.

16. Viral Infections : Localised skin conditions caused by viral infections include: Herpes simplex (cold sores and genital herpes), eczema herpeticum. Herpes zoster (shingles), including Ramsay Hunt syndrome. Herpangina / vesicular stomatitis (oral ulcers)

17. Vitiligo : Vitiligo is a disease in which the pigment cells of the skin, melanocytes, are destroyed in certain areas. Symptoms and signs of vitiligo include loss of skin color in the form of depigmented, or white, patches of skin in any location on the body.

descriptionHTML:
This app Color Atlas of Skin Diseases - Dermatology Atlas is for medical student, doctors, dermatologist, nurses and other health practitioners to understand Dermatology Atlas with Treatment. The cases contain pictures (Zoom in/Out of illustrated color images), etiology and treatment of many skin infections.

Contents of this app:

1. Introduction To Dermatology : Dermatology is the medical science of disorders of the skin. Often skin lesions and disorders are markers of internal disease and mirror the processes occurring within the body.

2. History Taking

3. Acne Vulgaris : Acne, also known as acne vulgaris, is a long-term skin disease that occurs when hair follicles are clogged with dead skin cells and oil from the skin.

4. Alopecia Areata : Alopecia areata, also known as spot baldness, is a condition in which hair is lost from some or all areas of the body.

5. Bacterial Infections : The most common are Staphylococcus and Streptococcus. Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (also known as MRSA) is now the most common pathogen causing skin infections in the United States.

6. Drug Eruptions : In medicine, a drug eruption is an adverse drug reaction of the skin.

7. Eczema : Eczema is a condition where patches of skin become inflamed, itchy, red, cracked, and rough. The word "eczema" is also used specifically to talk about atopic dermatitis, the most common type of eczema.

8. Fungal Infections : Yeast infections of the skin are called cutaneous candidiasis and are caused by yeast-like fungi called candida.

9. Leprosy : Leprosy is a chronic, progressive bacterial infection caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium leprae.

10. Lichen Planus : Lichen planus (LIE-kun PLAY-nus) is an inflammatory condition that can affect the skin, hair, nails and mucous membranes. On the skin, lichen planus usually appears as purplish, often itchy, flat-topped bumps, developing over several weeks.

11. Lupus Erythematosus : Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), also known simply as lupus, is an autoimmune disease in which the body's immune system mistakenly attacks healthy tissue in many parts of the body.

12. Parasitic Infections : Parasitic Infections of the Skin.

13. Pityriasis Rosea : Pityriasis rosea: This common skin disease causes patches on the skin. Pityriasis rosea (pit-uh-rahy-uh-sis row-zee-ah) is a common skin disease that causes a rash.

14. Psoriasis : Psoriasis is a common skin condition that speeds up the life cycle of skin cells. It causes cells to build up rapidly on the surface of the skin. The extra skin cells form scales and red patches that are itchy and sometimes painful.

15. Urticaria : Urticaria, also known as hives, is an outbreak of swollen, pale red bumps or plaques (wheals) on the skin that appear suddenly -- either as a result of the body's reaction to certain allergens, or for unknown reasons.

16. Viral Infections : Localised skin conditions caused by viral infections include: Herpes simplex (cold sores and genital herpes), eczema herpeticum. Herpes zoster (shingles), including Ramsay Hunt syndrome. Herpangina / vesicular stomatitis (oral ulcers)

17. Vitiligo : Vitiligo is a disease in which the pigment cells of the skin, melanocytes, are destroyed in certain areas. Symptoms and signs of vitiligo include loss of skin color in the form of depigmented, or white, patches of skin in any location on the body.

recentChanges: New features (like custom notifications in-app and out of app), accessibility improvements, and bug fixes.
comments: The Neutrogena Skin360 app provides a handy place to record skincare progress, but doesn't provide much more value than that to someone who is already experienced with skincare. The NAIA AI software doesn't always work smoothly.

It is nice to see these kind of apps that tries to somehow guide you through your skin problems and suggests you to try those problem specific products. However, I just felt it not so effective and practical as a lot of it depends on under what kind of lighting you are taking your photos. Also , every phone's camera's capacity is different so I don't think the app really works to it's best. However, I do like the product selections. You can easily find variety of skincare products.

The app is great for anyone who doesn't know where to start for their skincare routine. I was impressed with the products that were chosen for me as I use them already. I love that I can see my skin improving just from using this app. I even got my teen daughter hooked on the app, she says it keeps her wanting to improve her skin.

I like the analysis part of this application. It captured all of my face quickly and clearly and set me up with what would be best for my skin. I added a new face cleaner and moisturizer by Neutrogena. I think the app really is useful. My skin looks so much better now. Will definitely use again.

I was skeptical at first because let's be honest how is a app suppose to tell me what skin product I should use and it actually work. Boy was I wrong!! This app not only told me the products but it also gave me a morning routine and a night routine to follow. I give this app 5/5 stars and will never delete it! If you haven't tried it believe me you don't know what you're missing! Its so nice to know i don't have to keep wasting money and time on face cream and its all thanks to this amazing app
