title: SkinScreen
description:
The SkinScreen application extends human capabilities in the detection and classification of skin lesions/skin cancer in the support value-based healthcare goals. SkinScreen offers the capability to detect malignant and benign skin lesions in real-time through a highly accurate and precise solution. The solution leverages the power of deep learning, a method under artificial intelligence (AI), to allow quicker and more accurate predictions than previously were available. Through a term that we have trademarked, called Indescribable Model, it is an AI model that is seeded with hyperparameters initially however the model continually trains itself in finding the best fit against the dataset without any future human intervention required. Currently, the detection is manually performed by a dermatologist or technician through a heuristic approach known as ABCDE (Asymmetry, Border Irregularity, Color, Diameter, Evolution).

SkinScreen offers a number of differences than other solutions in the market:

1. Ensure user privacy - By leveraging the latest MobileNetV2 architecture the AI model is able to run on a user's device and no images need to be uploaded back to SkinScreen's servers unlike other solutions.

2. Detect whether a skin lesion is present - Many AI skin detection solutions do not detect whether a skin lesion is present in the image initially. They rely upon manual intervention by the human user to provide a skin lesion image. For example, if a user provides an image of a giraffe their solutions will classify the image regardless. SkinScreen's sophisticated AI model is able detect whether a skin lesion is present prior to classification.

3. Detect more classes of skin lesions - By detecting 9 common benign and malignant classes of skin lesions  (Actinic Keratoses, Angioma, Basal Cell Carcinoma, Dermatofibroma, Melanocytic nevus, Melanoma, Seborrheic keratoses, Squamous Cell Carcinoma, Vascular lesions)we are able provide better feedback for each individual who interfaces with SkinScreen. And we are continuing to expand the number of skin lesion classes that we support.

4. Provide higher accuracy and precision rates - We are leveraging a two-fold approach to accomplish the higher accuracy and precision rates. We first use a one-class classifier to identify whether a skin lesion is present in the image. If so, then we are able to provide back the 3 most likely skin lesion classes and their associated probabilities. Part of this is accomplished through the 180,000 images that we use to train our AI model.

5. Provide real-time feedback - SkinScreen is able to provide back results to the user in under two seconds on average. By leveraging MobileNetV2 architecture which has lower latency and higher accuracy and few proprietary enhancements we are able to notify the user of the results in a timely manner.

6. Provide user-friendly tools - SkinScreen's different platforms are able to assist users in their interactions with the tool. We try to accomplish this through support tools that are imperative in detecting skin lesions regardless of the user's background and skill sets.

title: Dermatology Exam StudyToken
description:
StudyToken Pro now available! For the price of a cup of coffee, enjoy ad-free content.

A beautifully designed quiz app to help you prepare for ABD Dermatology Exam. Simple and intuitive user interface. Quick and portable, on the go studying. No need for those heavy books or bulky note cards. No internet connection required. 

The American Board of Dermatology (ABD) certifies physicians in dermatology, dermatopathology, and pediatric dermatology. Board certified physicians are known as diplomates. Since its inception in 1932, the ABD has certified over 15,000 physicians. The ABD was one of the original four sponsoring organizations of the American Board of Medical Specialties (ABMS). Dermatologists possess expertise in all aspects of healthy and diseased skin through basic scientific research and clinical care. In addition to the wide range of medical diseases, dermatologists have practices devoted to skin surgery (including aesthetic procedures), care of children with skin disease, immunologic diseases of the skin and pathology of the skin. Dermatologists play an important role in the maintenance of the general public health in educating people about sun avoidance, sun protection and the signs of skin cancer.

Note: Questions are scrollable. Please let us know if there is an issue. We are always constantly updating the questions.

Disclaimer:
This application is just an excellent tool for self-study and exam preparation. It's not affiliated with or endorsed by any testing organization, certificate, test name or trademark.

title: Kyla Health
description:
If you are sick now, chat with a doctor and get prescriptions, labs, referrals for tests, and for specialists. 

Next, optimize your nutrition, exercise, sleep, mental health, and more.

How it works:
‚Ä¢ Unlike a symptom checker, you can chat with Kyla any time and get a diagnosis and a treatment plan from a medically licensed doctor. That includes prescriptions, labs and referrals.

‚Ä¢ Next, Kyla learns about your medical history and lifestyle to create a truly personalized healthcare journey just for you. Not just treating you when you are sick, but preventing you from getting sick in the first place.

‚Ä¢ Kyla focuses on daily health, education, healthy habits, medically-validated tests and preventative screenings.

‚Ä¢ Kyla monitors your data from in-app cards, chat, labs, imaging, mobile devices, and health tracking apps. When we find something to improve, we work with our team of doctors to create an optimal plan for you that both prevents illness and extends your longevity.

‚Ä¢ Once you take care of the basics, you get access to cutting-edge life extension services like advanced cardiovascular screenings, cancer screenings, cryonics, Whole Genome Sequencing (DNA) and more.

We Treat:
Allergies
Abdominal Pain
Acid Reflux
Arthritis
Anxiety
Asthma
Back pain / Neck Pain
Bowel / Digestive issues
Bronchitis
Blood pressure - Hypertension / Hypotension
Cold and Flu
Cholesterol conditions - Hyperlipidemia
Constipation
Cough
Chest Pain
Depression
Dermatology
Diarrhea
High Blood Sugar - Diabetes
Fatigue
Fever
Flu
Gout
Headaches
HPV
Influenza
Insomnia
Joint Pain / Swelling
Lab results
Medication Refills
Migraines
Respiratory diseases
UTI and Bladder Infections
Poison Ivy / Oak
Quit Smoking
Rash
Stress
Sinusitis
Skin injury
Skin health
Sore throat
Sprain
STI‚Äôs - herpes
Urination Issues - UTI
Yeast infection
Thousands of other conditions

Why trust Kyla?
We have treated over 350,000 patients.
We are HIPAA compliant.
We never sell your personal health information.
We have built-in safety tools, like checking for drug interactions.

Why choose Kyla?
Kyla lets you avoid the hassle, wait and cost of other telemedicine apps, walk in clinic, urgent cares or ERs. With Kyla you can chat with a doctor 365 days a year.

When are doctors available?
Our physicians are available 9am to 9pm PST.

Is insurance accepted?
If you need to get a prescription or further testing, you can use your insurance to pay those companies directly for their services.

Who are the providers?
Our providers are US-based, board-certified physicians (MDs), PAs, and NPs.

Does Kyla help with diet / meal plan?
There are many diets out there like Keto, Paleo, Atkins, Whole30, Low Carb, Mediterranean, Fasting. Just like having a personal dietician / therapist, Kyla can help you eat healthy and tasty while finding the diet that improves the most important thing - your longevity.

Does Kyla help with exercise?
Kyla helps you stay healthy. Going to the gym for a run / jog is not the best option for all. Neither is having six pack abs. For some people, it is yoga or swimming. Find out what it is for you.

What pharmacies do you prescribe to?
Safeway, Vons, Albertsons, Walgreens, CVS, and more.

Do you integrate with Medical, Health, and Activity Apps?
Yes. We integrate with Apple Health and Apple Watch and get data from nutrition trackers, calorie counters, food diary journals, fitness trackers, workout tracker and period tracker apps. Apps like Fitbit, Noom, Lifesum, Mealtime, Livestrong, WebMd, Lark, MyFitnessPal, Pacer, Runkeeper, Sweatcoin, Pedometer, Runtastic, Healthtap, itrackbites, Fooducate, Fitonomy, Mynetdiary, Fatsecret, Mapmyrun, Mapmywalk, Sworkit, GoodRx, AmWell, Doctor on Demand, Khealth and more.

title: Medical Terminology Dictionary:Search&Vocabulary
descriptionHTML:
Medical Terminology: Search Words & Medical Vocabulary

Medical Reference is an offline encyclopedia of medical terms right on your device. More than 40 thousand of thematic articles: definition medical terms, phrases, abbreviations, deciphered in English.
This application allows you to quickly learn and understand complex medical terminology. Medical app contains dictionary of most common used medical terms, diseases, tests and symptoms extended by external sources with tons of medical terminology.

Features "Medical Terminology - Dictionary offline":
‚Ä¢ learn vocabulary and the definition with word search;
‚Ä¢ medical reference book and thesaurus covering all medical terminologies and abbreviations.
‚Ä¢ a very quick search word for medical terms;
‚Ä¢ complete offline dictionary (no internet connection required for definition terms);
‚Ä¢ huge database of medical terminologies, medical vocabulary;
‚Ä¢ email any of the terms instantly;
‚Ä¢ find medical terms. learn words and further your education with your pocket thesaurus;
‚Ä¢ unlimited bookmarks, search word & learn;
‚Ä¢ abbreviations offline app;
‚Ä¢ unlimited history;
‚Ä¢ compatible with modern version of Android Devices;
‚Ä¢ very efficient, fast and good performance;
‚Ä¢ quick search words, terms, phrases;
‚Ä¢ automatic free updates whenever new terms gets added;
‚Ä¢ application is designed to occupy as much as less memory as possible.

In this offline dictionary you will find descriptions of such words as:
‚Ä¢ Anorexia - is a decreased appetite. While the term in non-scientific publications is often used interchangeably with anorexia nervosa, many possible causes exist for a decreased appetite, some of which may be harmless, while others indicate a serious clinical condition or pose a significant risk;
‚Ä¢ An Abscess is a collection of pus that has built up within the tissue of the body;
‚Ä¢ Abortion is the ending of a pregnancy by removal or expulsion of an embryo or fetus before it can survive outside the uterus;
‚Ä¢ The abdomen is the part of the body between the thorax (chest) and pelvis, in humans and in other vertebrates;
‚Ä¢ Sepsis is a life-threatening condition that arises when the body's response to infection causes injury to its own tissues and organs;
‚Ä¢ Edema, also spelled oedema or ≈ìdema, is an abnormal accumulation of fluid in the interstitium, located beneath the skin and in the cavities of the body, which can cause severe pain;
‚Ä¢ Acne, also known as acne vulgaris, is a long-term skin disease that occurs when hair follicles are clogged with dead skin cells and oil from the skin;
‚Ä¢ Apnea is the cessation of breathing;
‚Ä¢ Glaucoma is a group of eye diseases which result in damage to the optic nerve and cause vision loss;
‚Ä¢ Cardiovascular disease (CVD) is a class of diseases that involve the heart or blood vessels;
‚Ä¢ Cancer is a group of diseases involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body;
‚Ä¢ Chronic lower respiratory disease;
‚Ä¢ ALL: Acute lymphoblastic leukemia;
‚Ä¢ B-ALL: B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia;
‚Ä¢ FSH: Follicle stimulating hormone;
‚Ä¢ A blood tests for follicle stimulating hormone which is used to evaluate fertility in women;
‚Ä¢ HAPE: High altitude pulmonary edema;

Used by healthcare professionals pharmaceuticals, hospital nurses, medical students, pharmacy, physician assistants and for students who work in clinical practice & dispensary.
This offline directory contains information from various medical books (free download). Ideal for medical students to improve their knowledge. With this simple, powerful and free encyclopedia offline you can reveal meanings of thousands of medical terms in English language.

If you liked the offline encyclopedia, please write us and share link to the application Medical Terminology - Dictionary offline with your friends.

title: QR & Barcode Reader
description:
QR & Barcode Reader is a modern QR code scanner and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay and Google - 100% FREE!

ALL COMMON FORMATS
Scan all common barcode formats: QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39 and many more.

RELEVANT ACTIONS
Open URLs, connect to WiFi hotspots, add calendar events, read VCards, find product and price information, etc.

SECURITY AND PERFORMANCE
Protect yourself from malicious links with Chrome Custom Tabs featuring Google Safe Browsing technology and profit from shorter loading times.

MINIMAL PERMISSIONS
Scan an image without giving access to your device storage. Even share contact data as QR code without giving access to your address book!

SCAN FROM IMAGES
Detect codes within picture files or scan directly using the camera.

FLASHLIGHT AND ZOOM
Activate the flashlight for reliable scans in dark environments and use pinch-to-zoom to read barcodes even from far distances.

CREATE AND SHARE
Share arbitrary data such as website links with the built-in QR code generator by displaying them on your screen as a QR code and scanning them with another device.

CUSTOM SEARCH OPTIONS
Get specific information by adding custom websites into the barcode search (i.e. your favorite shopping website).

CSV EXPORT AND ANNOTATIONS
Manage unlimited history and export it (as CSV file). Import it to Excel or save it to any cloud storage such as Google Drive. Annotate your scans and manage product inventory or implement quality assurance in your small business!

Enjoy one of the best QR code reader apps available for smartphones and tablets running Android 6.0 or higher.

Supported QR codes:
‚Ä¢ website links (URL)
‚Ä¢ contact data (MeCard, vCard, vcf)
‚Ä¢ calendar events
‚Ä¢ WiFi hotspot access information
‚Ä¢ geo locations
‚Ä¢ phone call information
‚Ä¢ email, SMS and MATMSG

Barcodes and two-dimensional codes:
‚Ä¢ article numbers (EAN, UPC, JAN, GTIN, ISBN)
‚Ä¢ Codabar or Codeabar
‚Ä¢ Code 39, Code 93 and Code 128
‚Ä¢ Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF)
‚Ä¢ PDF417
‚Ä¢ GS1 DataBar (RSS-14)
‚Ä¢ Aztec Code
‚Ä¢ Data Matrix

title: Natural Remedies For Loose And Sagging Skin
description:
While there are a few things you can do to prevent sagging skin, and a few that will help saggy skin, an actual home remedy to help sagging skin may be hard to find.

Since the cause of loose and sagging skin is the loss of collagen, elastin and hyaluronic acid, the only real way to fix it is to replenish those lost proteins. This can be hard to do without outside help.

Proper nutrition, exercise and hydration can go a long way to prevent saggy skin, and can even help to reverse loose skin.

Eating a diet rich in fruits, vegetables and whole grains will keep your skin nourished with the vitamins it needs as well as provide some anti-oxidants. Keeping well hydrated will prevent wrinkles and loose skin as well.

Sun damage can also be a major cause of wrinkly sagging skin. Always cover up and use a high SPF sunscreen when you are out in the sun and avoid tanning beds altogether.

UV rays are hard on the skin and cause premature aging of the skin as well as increase your risk of skin cancer.

While not specifically a home remedy to help sagging skin, the best thing you can do is use a good quality anti-aging skin cream every day. Do not be fooled by all of the great looking products on the shelves though. Most of them are completely ineffective and many are even harmful.

title: Alimentation Anti Cancer
description:
On estime qu‚Äôun homme sur deux et une femme sur trois seront touch√©s par un cancer au cours de leur vie. Chez l‚Äôhomme, les cancers les plus fr√©quents sont : le cancer de la prostate, du poumon et du c√¥lon ; chez la femme, ce sont : le cancer du sein, du c√¥lon et celui du poumon. 

Bien manger r√©duit non seulement le risque de d√©velopper un cancer mais l'adjonction d'aliments dits "anti cancer" fournit une aide extraordinaire aux cellules de notre corps pour combattre les inflammations et le d√©veloppement de cellules canc√©reuses.

Le cancer peut toucher tous les organes. Il est d√ª √† la multiplication non contr√¥l√©e et la mutation de cellules du corps qui finissent par former une tumeur. 

Le plus souvent la cause est inconnue. Mais certains cancers ont des causes pr√©cises : une forte exposition au soleil pour le m√©lanome, √† l‚Äôamiante pour le cancer de la pl√®vre, le tabagisme pour le cancer du poumon‚Ä¶ 

Non d√©truites, ces cellules canc√©reuses peuvent envahir d‚Äôautres organes. On parle alors de m√©tastases. Si le cancer s‚Äô√©tend √† plusieurs organes, il s‚Äôagit d‚Äôun cancer g√©n√©ralis√©. 

Le nombre de cancers d√©tect√©s augmente gr√¢ce au perfectionnement des techniques de d√©pistage ce qui permet une prise en charge plus rapide et de plus grandes chances de gu√©rison.

Le plus souvent les sympt√¥mes d‚Äôun cancer sont inexistants. Mais on peut observer : 
- Une toux persistante, du sang dans les crachats (cancer du poumon)
- Une voix inhabituellement rauque (cancer de la gorge ou du poumon)
- Des probl√®mes digestifs persistants (cancer colorectal ou du pancr√©as)
- Des difficult√©s √† avaler (cancer de l‚Äô≈ìsophage)
- Une modification du transit : diarrh√©e, constipation, sang dans les selles (cancer colorectal)
- Du sang dans les urines (cancer du rein ou de la vessie)
- Une grosseur inhabituelle dans le sein (cancer du sein)

Une palpation, une analyse de sang, une √©chographie, une radio ou une IRM peuvent permettre de d√©celer une tumeur. Pour poser le diagnostic une biopsie est n√©cessaire. 

Pour pr√©venir un cancer il faut:

- Avoir une alimentation vari√©e et √©quilibr√©e
- Pratiquer une activit√© physique r√©guli√®re
- Ne pas fumer ni consommer trop d‚Äôalcool
- Perdre du poids si vous √™tes en surpoids

Le cancer est le mal du si√®cle. Avoir une bonne hygi√®ne de vie permet d'en r√©duire les risques, notamment par une alimentation √©quilibr√©e et vari√©e. De nombreux aliments poss√®dent des vertus anticancer. L'ail en fait partie, tout comme l'oignon, l'√©chalote ou la ciboulette, pour ne citer qu'eux, cette application vous propose de d√©couvrir les aliments de lutte contre le cancer, ainsi que des recommandations alimentaires bien adapt√©s concernant autant les personnes qui souhaitent pr√©venir le cancer que celles qui en sont atteintes ou qui souhaitent √©viter une r√©cidive.

title: UV notifier: Protect your skin
description:
Exposure to sunlight‚Äôs ultraviolet radiation (UV) can damage to your skin, cause sunburn and increase your risk of skin cancer. our app shows you when you need to take care and when you can safely enjoy the sun.
- Get active more. Spend more time outdoors AND stay safe from the sun.
- Keep your family safe, designed to warn you when the UV is really high.
- Education. Learn what you need to do depending on how strong the UV is.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Plan out the best time to be outside
See the UV index forecast for the day, see when it‚Äôs safe to be outside and when to avoid the sun.

‚Ä¢ Find your burn risk
Find out how long you can spend in the sun without sunscreen by taking a personalised skin type assessment.

‚Ä¢ Shedding light on UV
UV is deceptive and invisible to our eyes, learn what protection measures to take and when to apply sunscreen.

title: Mushroom Wars 2: RTS Tower Defense & Mushroom War
description:
Mushroom Wars 2 is an award-winning real-time strategy game mixed with tactics of Tower Defense and the hero skill elements of a MOBA.

üèÜ Best Mobile Game, GTP Indie Cup 2017
üèÜ Best Multiplayer Game, Casual Connect 2017
üèÜ Best Strategy Game, White Nights

Command mushroom armies in real-time!
Upgrade your fungi base, capture battle map objectives and lead your tribe to victory one tower at a time. Plan your defenses strategically and blitz through their frontlines in more than 200 challenging missions!

Multiplayer PVP and Co-Op modes
Challenge your friends or play with them - in true and fair online PVP matches for up to 4 people win the most skillful mushroom generals. Ranked leagues will show how you stack up against real competition.

The ultimate combination of RTS and TD games
Summon legendary heroes with mighty skills that act as generals while you command the mushroom tribe minions. Power up your team with buffs and sneaky abilities to gain the upper hand in breaking the enemy defenses in real-time.

Welcome to the most fungal battlefield action, now download Mushroom Wars 2 and craft your strategy!

comments: Very fun game, but insanely expensive. Want to play single player? You have to pay for it. Want to upgrade your multi-player? You have to pay for it. Then there's the battle pass, premium pass, and thats not even getting to the pop ups after every game spamming you about other deals you can buy. The devs have something here, for the 1%.

So fun but death by ads. I paid for the premium, I paid to unlock the extra levels. The premium was a joke, the ads keep coming. If you want to open a chest, watch an ad. Ad after ad after ad. Horribly frustrating experience. I'm done playing. I can't compete with the pay to win or the AI and they have payed a massive amount. So much potential, so far behind. I know developers need to make money but the trade-off is the customer should feel satisfied, not cheated. Uninstalling. Sad retort Z.W.

Enjoyable but man those ads. They push "sales" and make you watch ads to do almost anything if you don't want to wait 12 hrs to get your energy back up. Tone down the ads and constant "offers" and I would actually be more likely to pay something. Due to the ads I actually have negative opinions on games I have never played before since you can only see the same ads over and over so often before getting a bad opinion.

The game was great. Addictive. I am free player and been able to reach to lvl16 but the pain is to constantly watching ads. I have pay few bucks for an apps but with this pay to win games, I don't think I will able to spend any anount to this game. Today, the games cannot load. just stop at loading page. hope there is an update for me to tickle win by pay player ^.^

Good Game, but poor balance mechanic. Some fights are so lop sided I feel bad for who I fought. Some others the enemy kills you before you even launch your first attack. But still lots of fun. However this is definitely a pay to win game. Want you obtained Max rank all your characters you cannot continue to advance the upgrades without spending money

title: Indigo Dermatology
description:
The Indigo Dermatology introduces the mobile application specifically designed to serve consumers looking for comprehensive skin care and related health information. We offer a range of services for improving your skin's health. The entire skin care department is headed under the supervised vision guided by Sumeet Thareja, MD who is an Aesthetic Specialist & Board Certified Dermatologist located in Melbourne, FL & Tampa, FL.

The app will provide:

- Access to evidence-based, dermatologist-approved health care information for skin care and health
- Expert insights on diseases affecting especially skin and the latest medical and cosmetic treatments
- Book an appointment online
- Scientifically proven products and procedures that promote skin health and wellbeing

Indigo Dermatology is specialized in the diagnosis of skin disorders. BOARD-CERTIFIED DERMATOLOGIST ‚Äì and staff who is also Board Certified Family Nurse Practitioner by the American Nurses Credentialing Center (ANCC) with specialized training at top medical institutions.

Features of Indigo Dermatology include:

Photo-intensive database allows users to search, view side-by-side variations of each skin disorder, easily zoom in on any of the high-resolution images, and instantly link to similar conditions to ensure an accurate diagnosis. Each entry also contains clinical history, physical findings, and treatment options.

- High-quality images presented with common variations in presentation
- Point-of-care guidance for various dermatologic conditions
- Cross-reference links to differential diagnoses
- History and treatment within each entry

Services of Indigo Dermatology include:

1) SCULPSURE WITH BEFORE AND AFTER GALLERY

SculpSure is an advanced body contouring treatment by CynoSure¬Æ that‚Äôs designed to permanently reduce resistant fat using precision laser energy to target the fat cells beneath your skin, without affecting the skin itself which is absolutely safe and FDA-approved.

2) MICRONEEDLING

Instead of using laser energy to burn these microchannels through the skin, the STRATAPEN‚Ñ¢ uses disposable Biolock needle cartridges propelled by the STRATAPEN‚Ñ¢ to create microchannels. This mechanical creation of microchannels avoids the use of heat, thermal energy, or chemicals and virtually eliminates post-treatment sensitivity and downtime while achieving spectacular results. Rest assured, you are in utmost good care if you are opting for Microneedling from Indigo Dermatology.

3) HAIR LOSS - PRP

Causes:

- Female hormonal changes
- Certain medical conditions
- Certain prescription drugs
- Chronic psychological stress

What is PRP therapy?

Platelet-rich plasma therapy is a therapeutic hair restoration treatment for male and female patients. Broadly it contains a wide variety of bioactive substances, such as:

- Platelet-derived growth factor (PDGF)
- Vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF)
- Transforming growth factor (TGF)

4) SKIN CANCER

Basal cell carcinoma (v BCC) and squamous cell carcinoma (SCC), which are also commonly referred to as non-melanoma cancers, are the two most prevalent types of skin cancer. If you spot any of the following symptoms then have it consult Indigo Dermatology for the same:

The ABCDEs of atypical moles are:

Asymmetry: One half does not match the other
Border: Irregular, scalloped, or poorly defined border
Color: Varied color, including shades of tan, brown, black, white, red, or blue, within a single mole, spot, or lesion
Diameter: Melanomas tend to be larger than the size of a pencil eraser
Evolution: A mole or lesion that has changed in size, color, or shape 

5) PSORIASIS

Causes:
- Certain infections, such as strep throat
- Skin injuries, including cuts or sunburns

Additionally, get end-to-end consultation and treatment on below-mentioned skin care & other services such as:

6) ECZEMA
7) IPL
8) WRINKLE REDUCTION
9) BOTOX & FILLERS

title: Vivino: Buy the Right Wine
description:
With 42 million users, Vivino is the world‚Äôs largest wine community and the ultimate destination for discovering and buying wines. 

HOW IT WORKS
‚Ä¢ Scan: Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine
‚Ä¢ Learn: Instantly see detailed information about the wine and all available purchasing options
‚Ä¢ Review: Community powered wine ratings, reviews, average price, food pairings and more provided on every wine
‚Ä¢ Buy: To purchase, tap the green buy button and have it shipped to your door - always buy the right wine
‚Ä¢ Rate: Add your own ratings and reviews to build your wine profile and enhance your personalized recommendations
‚Ä¢ Track: Easily keep track of wines you have tried, including personal rating, notes and date consumed
‚Ä¢ Store: Free cellar tracking to always know what wine you have on hand in your collection

STATS
‚Ä¢ 42 million users 
‚Ä¢ World‚Äôs largest wine library with 11.9 million wines
‚Ä¢ 2 million wines viewed daily on average
‚Ä¢ 1 billion wine labels scanned to date
‚Ä¢ 220,000 wineries featured

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢  Wine Buying Made Easy: Vivino is the ultimate online destination for all your wine buying needs - the largest wine selection, personalized wine recommendations, free shipping options and honest community ratings and review. 
‚Ä¢ Crowdsourced Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world‚Äôs largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
‚Ä¢  Restaurant Wine List Scanner: Always select the best wine from any restaurant wine list menu.
‚Ä¢  Quick Compare: Pick the best wine right at the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels to instantly view ratings, region, price and food pairings all on one page.
‚Ä¢  Taste Profile: Track and organize your scanned and rated wines to determine your personal taste profile, discover new wines and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

recentChanges:
For every moment, we help you discover the perfect wine. In this update:
‚Äî Introducing Taste Profile ‚Äî a better way to find the right wine for you. Easily set your preferences including grape, region, style and more. Quickly see what wines you've liked (or disliked) and we'll help you discover new ones. Try it now by tapping on your photo in the profile section!

Contact our customer support team at vivino.com/‚Äãsupport or select "Help and Support" from the Vivino app (under Profile > Settings).
comments: I really have nothing else to say. The app is a lost cause. I made a point many years ago when the app was first launched about the app kept messing up the syncing process between the quantity or record of a wine entry with the record at the database server. This problem was never fixed! Today I found the same error with the quantity of a wine I have just couple days ago, and I found the quantity of the wine was unchanged. Can u trust a tech company can't even get its database syncing right?

This should allow two ratings. For looking up wines and getting descriptions and reviews, this app is great. You can even take a photo of the label and most of the time it'll find it. This has kept me away from accidentally buying sweet wines (not my gig). Love it for this use. Then I used Vivino for ordering wine - I have done it twice. Once the order was placed and weeks later it didn't ship. No notice why or if it would be shipped. Cancelled that. Later I tried again, ordering a case of one of my go-to wines from a different sub-retailer in Vivino. The order was shipped in a very reasonable time this order, but upon opening it they had substituted for the entire case with a different wine. No warning, just did it. Were it one bottle, I would be (only) ok with this, but for a case, without warning, this is unacceptable. The thing that has ended my ordering on Vivino is that, having had this happen, I can't get Vivino to even answer an email or respond to the 'contact' tab on their site. I frankly don't know if anyone works there anymore, certainly nobody is manning the email address or contact input. I have reached out both ways for the third time today and will be calling the credit card to have the charges reversed.

Why only 4 stars?! The application is good, pretty sure I'll use it for several times, but the 1st thing I noticed, that the tutorial after the "see how it works" button is completely unreadable (at least for me it is..). Light brownish background with small grey text. Please take into consideration to change it. :)
Love it and recommend it often. It's a great way to broaden your palette. I've tried so many new wines based on a decent rating and generally been happy I did. Also helped me to avoid a few bad ones.

Used to be a good app, but now it's just annoying when it takes over your screen to install a non-existent update, that usually comes along a week after the first red screen appears. Suggestions to remove the annoyance have gone unheard (contacted via the app)

title: Back Pain - causes, symptoms, treatments
description:
Back pain is a common reason for absence from work and doctor visits. Although back pain may be painful and uncomfortable, it is not usually serious. Even though back pain can affect people of any age, it is significantly more common among adults aged between 35 and 55 years. Experts say that back pain is associated with the way our bones, muscles and ligaments in our backs work and connect together.

Pain in the lower back may be linked to the bony lumbar spine, discs between the vertebrae, ligaments around the spine and discs, spinal cord and nerves, lower back muscles, abdomen and pelvic internal organs, and the skin around the lumbar area.

Pain in the upper back may be due to disorders of the aorta, tumors in the chest, and spine inflammation.

Back pain is a common problem that affects most people at some point or time in their life. Your back is a complex structure made up of bones, muscles, nerves and joints. This can often make it difficult to pinpoint the exact cause of the pain.Most cases of back pain aren't caused by serious damage or disease but by minor sprains, strains or injuries, or a pinched or irritated nerve.

These types of back pain can be triggered by everyday activities at home or at work, or they can develop gradually, over time.

We encourage you to read and follow the guidelines in this back pain app and it will help you in the long run.

title: Dermatologic and Cosmetic Procedures
description:
This state of the art app contains procedural videos, photographs, labelled drawings and text to help you perform a wide range of dermatological and cosmetic procedures in your office. 

Over 900 full-color photographs and drawings in combination with 78 high-definition narrated videos clearly demonstrate key procedures, including skin biopsies, cryosurgery, electrosurgery, botulinum toxin injections, and more. 
‚Ä¢ Master dermatologic and cosmetic procedures thanks to 78 narrated, high-definition videos demonstrating skin biopsies, cryosurgery, electrosurgery, botulinum toxin injections, dermal fillers and excision of skin cancers, cysts, and lipomas. 
‚Ä¢ See how to perform each procedure clearly from detailed, full-color photographs and drawings and step-by-step instructions. 
‚Ä¢ Learn how to use dermoscopy to more accurately detect skin cancer, the latest information on lasers, botulinum toxin injections and dermal fillers, the diagnosis and treatment of benign and malignant lesions, and more. 
‚Ä¢ Includes coding and billing details, consent forms and patient education handouts. 
‚Ä¢ The text is clearly referenced with attention to available evidence. 

Instantly and accurately diagnose and treat the full range of skin diseases with superb images and text that look great on your mobile device. No Internet connection needed to view the text, photographs and many of the videos. It is all ready for super quick image and information retrieval. The longer high-definition videos are rapidly and efficiently streamed to your device wirelessly over the Internet. This app is optimized for whatever size device you are using, either phone or tablet.

This app is easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search by keywords. The search tool will find text, figures and videos with one single search. The search tool shows you suggested words as you type so it is quick and helps with spelling issues. The search results provide the most relevant results at the top of each search. This app lets you create bookmarks and notes for each chapter, figure, and table, allowing you to customize the content to fit your needs. 


This interactive app is based on the full content of Dermatologic and Cosmetic Procedures in Office Practice by Elsevier. 

Authors:
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, Professor of Family & Community Medicine, Fellowship Director, Underserved Dermatology Fellowship, Medical Director, Skin Clinic, University Health System, University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio, Texas
John L. Pfenninger, MD
Daniel L. Stulberg, MD
Rebecca Small, MD


Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. 


Developed by Usatine Media, LLC 
Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Dermatology and Cutaneous Surgery, University of Texas Health Science Center San Antonio 
Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

title: Tiny Scanner - PDF Scanner App
description:
Tiny Scanner is a little scanner app that turns android device into a portable document scanner and scans everything as images or PDFs.

With this pdf document scanner app you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. This pdf document scanner app is lightning fast and gorgeously designed for both phone and tablet.

IS THAT A SCANNER IN YOUR POCKET?

Tiny Scanner is a pdf document scanner app that turns your mobile into a portable scanner. Scans are saved to your device as images or PDFs. Name and organize your scans into folders, or share them by:

- Email
- Wifi directly to your computer
- Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box(Available in subscription mode)

This document scanner app has all the BIG features you need:

* Scan in color, grayscale, or black & white
* AI Powered OCR(different languages, editing results, handwritings recognition, copying, sharing or saving as txt, etc.)(Available in subscription mode)
* Can be used in office, school, home and anywhere else you want
* Page edges are detected automatically
* 5 levels of contrast for crisp monochrome texts
* Set page sizes for PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more)
* Thumbnail or list view, sort scans by date or title
* Tiny Scanner is optimized to run very fast.
* Quick search by document title
* Protect your documents with a passcode
* Universal ‚Äì a single app that works on phone and tablet too!

The free version is an ad-supported version and has some function restrictions, we also offer an ad-free version with no function restrictions which is available as in-app purchase.
All Premium Features:
- Scan documents unlimitedly
- Batch Mode Scanning
- AI Powered OCR(different languages, editing results, handwritings recognition, copying, sharing or saving as txt, etc. 200 pages per month)
- All sharing options(Google Drive, Dropbox, Onedrive, Box, Evernote.)
- Send documents to the preset Mail Me address
- Add signature

Payment models for Premium Subscription:
- $3.99/month
- $19.99/year(3 days free trial)

Please note the subscription is automatically renewed unless you choose to cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the current period in Subscriptions on Google Play.

Permissions Used in Tiny Scanner:
1. Storage: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: Tiny Scanner needs this permission to use camera to scan docs.

GOT QUESTIONS? CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO SOMETHING?
If you have any problem about this scanner app please email us at tinyscan.a@appxy.com, and we‚Äôll help you figure it out.

Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official
Like us on Facebook: Appxy
Follow us on Google+: Appxy

‚òÖ Web Protection offers comprehensive phone security while surfing online to help protect you against visiting malicious and phishing sites.

‚òÖ Safe Search: In-app search engine connects to NortonLifeLock‚Äôs global threat database to flag unsafe sites right in your search results.

‚òÖ Call Blocking allows you to automatically block calls from specific phone numbers or anonymous or unknown numbers (smartphones only).

‚òÖ Android System Advisor: Helps scan your device and Android OS to identify points of attack that can leave you exposed to cyber threats

‚òÖ Privacy Report Interactive Map shows where in the world apps send personal information and photos



---------------------------------------------

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: Scanner App for Me: Scan Documents to PDF
description:
Overwhelmed with papers? Make your life easier - go paperless at home or at the office with this lightweight scanner app for your Android!  Scanner for Me is a handy all-in-one app that turns your device into a multifunctional office tool. Scan, edit, organize, print and share your docs in a tap! 

Using only your Android device you can instantly scan to PDF and print any written, printed or graphic material, including: 
- Contracts for your partners or clients;
- Business cards;
- Receipts to track your expenses;
- Paper notes and mindmaps to save the best ideas for future reference;
- Book pages and articles for further reading and analysis;
- Texts that don't offer a digital copy;
Or play with the multiple editing options and filters to use the app as a full-fledged photo scanner.

This smart PDF-scanner helps you manage your documents easily:

SCAN any written, printed or graphic material with camera or add snaps from camera roll. You can even merge multi-page agreements and books into one file.The scanner app detects page edges automatically and makes perfect scans in seconds.
EDIT perspective and borders, adjust scanner brightness, rotate pages, apply filters or correct capture area borders if needed. 
PRINT scanned papers, as well as the text from Clipboard, attached to emails files and webpages.
STORE all files directly in the scanner app, sort them by folders and find in seconds when needed. Or, easily upload to your cloud storage (Dropbox, Google Drive, Box, etc.)
SHARE each file separately or send a number of files in one document via Mail and any other 3rd party applications. Or simply export them to Photos.


‚ôï Scan like a PRO using the PREMIUM app features ‚ôï
CONVERT your scans into editable and searchable text that can be extracted and copy-pasted. Optical Character Recognition (OCR) makes it possible.
SIGN documents easily on the screen of your device. With this PDF-scanner you can create and save an electronic signature to promptly add it to your scans.
HIGHLIGHT the key points of your scans to glean the main idea at a glance. 
PRINT & SHARE without limits and ads!

Scanning papers and pictures to pdf has never been easier. Take full advantage of this mobile scanner app to simplify the mess of papers!

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Privacy Policy: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4
California Privacy Notice: https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h

comments: App works ok but when you no longer need it, there is no place in the app to unsubscribe. After completely un-downloading the app I'm still getting charged so I went to support in the app and sent an email to the address they have in there and my email was returned as undeliverable. This Sucks

Too much ads. Plain greedy devs who won't let you scan more than 5 pages a day even after bombarding you with ads all along the way. Don't install just look somewhere else. The free option shouldn't even exist since it's useless. Rather use the Adobe Scan with better alternatives for basically free.

I used to be able to export image or pdf to sd card or internal storage, now the app makes it very difficult in the free mode to achieve the only task it is meant for, plus there are ads. Why not just make it a paid app then if the free version is not useful? Changing app to a fairer business model
the images just look like pictures. not scan quality at all
Its insta ad shows that it can read even doctor handwriting, but no such functionality.

title: Biop AI
description:
Non-invasive detection of  malignant cancer


Biop AI helps you and doctors in the early-detection process by checking your skin for signs with instant results on the mobile phone. We are using novel artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms for analysing key features on the skin. Our technology combined with the knowledge of dermatologist through our telemedicine services helps you in keeping your skin healthy.
Your skin is susceptible to changes along time for many reasons, including aging, genetic predisposition, allergies, or excess exposure to UV from sun. Some of this properties can lead to diseases including skin cancer, which shows no sign at a first-glance and can go unnoticed easily, making it difficult for the doctors to provide a diagnosis at a proper time. The sooner we detect cancer, the higher the accuracy of the treatments and the survival.

title: Remedies For Sunburn
description:
Sunburn is a phenomenon caused by excessive or over-exposure to the ultra-violet or UV radiation of the sun or sun-equivalent sources like welding arcs or tanning lamps. It causes the skin to burn and acquire a blackish or darkish hue. In other words, the skin tans due to sun burn. People visiting beaches, going for fishing, skiing, swimming working in yards, going to high altitudes or to places near the equator are at the risk of experiencing sunburns. The symptoms of sunburn start showing or occurring within 30 minutes of exposure to the scorching sun rays.

The exposure causes fair-skinned people to become dark, causes itching and inflammation of skin and may cause wrinkles or premature aging of the skin. Under certain circumstances, sunburns can be fatal leading to skin cancers. However normal exposure to sun is essential, for the UV radiation produces vitamin D that beneficial for skin; but over-exposure to sun is to be avoided for it may cause sunburns. Certain factors like consumption of contraceptive pills, antibacterial agents in soaps make the skin prone to sunburn. One can avoid sunburns to some extent by using sunscreen creams and lotions, sunglasses, wide brimmed hat, and umbrella while going out in the sun.

Symptoms

1. Redness of skin
2. Skin irritation
3. Rashes
4. Pain
5. Tenderness on skin
6. Blisters
7. Dehydration
8. Chills
9. Fever
10. Vomiting and nausea
11. Flu-like symptoms
12. Peeling off of dry skin or skin loss.

Home Remedies for Sunburn

1. Application of cool aloe Vera gel on the burnt skin soothes rashes and skin irritation.

2. Washing the burnt area with vinegar helps in reducing skin inflammation and pain.

3. Rubbing the affected skin with mustard oil and then allowing it to dry is an effective home remedy for sunburns. This treatment would take the heat off the skin.

4. Rubbing the affected area with freshly cut cucumber slices also helps. The astringent effect of cucumber checks itching and redness of skin.

5. Placing grated potatoes on the burnt skin is also a good remedy. The starch content in the potato soothes the burns.

6. Dabbing the burnt skin with a cotton ball soaked in apple cider vinegar also yields good results.

7. Taking ice compress or Epsom salt water compress heals skin inflammation and burning sensation.

8. Taking a bath with baking powder or oatmeal added to bath water brings much relief.

9. Application of peppermint oil or lavender oil on the affected skin has a soothing effect.

10. Applying juice of lemon diluted with water on skin reduces tanning.

11. Yoghurt application also checks tanning due to sunburn.

12. Drinking plenty of fluids would help to control sun burn symptoms.

13. Adding sandal wood oil or rose water to cold bath water would serve as a refreshing bath for sunburn victims.

14. Laying cold, refrigerated lettuce or cabbage leaves on the burnt skin would give much relief.

15. A paste made out of barley powder, milk, olive oil and honey may be applied on burnt skin. This is an effective home remedy for sunburns on face.

16. A mixture of tomato juice and butter milk also fetches good results in case of sunburns.

Know more effective Home Remedies for Sunburn in this app..

title: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
description:
Join your friends in a brand new 5v5 MOBA showdown against real human opponents, Mobile Legends: Bang Bang! Choose your  favorite heroes and build the perfect team with your comrades-in-arms! 10-second matchmaking, 10-minute battles. Laning, jungling, tower rushing, team battles, all the fun of PC MOBAs and action games in the palm of your hand! Feed your eSports spirit!

Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, 2017‚Äôs brand new mobile eSports masterpiece. Shatter your opponents with the touch of your finger and claim the crown of strongest Challenger!

Your phone thirsts for battle!

Features: 

1. Classic MOBA Maps, 5v5 Battles 
Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy‚Äôs tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy 
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory 
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master 
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart‚Äôs content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches 
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance 
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang‚Äôs powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you‚Äôre offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us 
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Instagram: @mobilelegendsgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

Real-time 5v5 battles against real opponents. Fight over 3 lanes to take the enemy‚Äôs tower. 4 jungle areas. 18 defense towers. 2 Wild Bosses. Complete reproductions of classic MOBA maps. Full-on 5v5, Human vs. Human battles. A triumphant return to genuine MOBA gameplay.

2. Win with Teamwork & Strategy
Block damage, control the enemy, and heal teammates! Choose from Tanks, Mages, Marksmen, Assassins, Supports, etc. to anchor your team or be match MVP! New heroes are constantly being released!

3. Fair Fights, Carry Your Team to Victory
Just like classic MOBAs, there is no hero training or paying for stats. Winners and losers are decided based on skill and ability on this fair and balanced platform for competitive gaming. Play to Win, not Pay to Win.

4. Simple Controls, Easy to Master
With a virtual joystick on the left and skill buttons on the right, 2 fingers are all you need to become a master! Autolock and target sifting allow you to last hit to your heart‚Äôs content. Never miss! And a convenient tap-to-equip system lets you focus on the thrill of battle!

5. 10 Second Matchmaking, 10 Minute Matches
Matchmaking only takes 10 seconds, and battles last 10 minutes, glossing over the quiet early-game leveling up and jumping right into intense battles. Less boring waiting and repetitive farming, and more thrilling action and fist-pumping victories. At any place, at any moment, just pick up your phone, fire up the game, and immerse yourself in heart-pounding MOBA competition.

6. Smart Offline AI Assistance
In most MOBAs, a dropped connection means hanging your team out to dry, but with Mobile Legends: Bang Bang‚Äôs powerful reconnection system, if you get dropped, you can be back in the battle in seconds. And while you‚Äôre offline, your character will be controlled by our AI system to avoid a 5-on-4 situation.

PLEASE NOTE! Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Mobile Legends: Bang Bang.

Contact Us
You can get customer service assistance via the [Contact Us] button in the game to help you with any problems you may encounter while playing. You can also find us on the following platforms. We welcome all of your Mobile Legends: Bang Bang thoughts and suggestions:

Customer Service Email: MobileLegendsGame@gmail.com
Instagram: @mobilelegendsgame
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/MobileLegends5v5MOBA

title: GlobalUV
description:
Although small amounts of UV radiation are beneficial to health, overexposure can lead to skin cancer. The main determinant of UVI is the sun's elevation angle. UVI values are thus greatest in the summer, especially near solar noon. At mid-latitudes, peak UVI can reach summer peak values greater than 10, but in winter, the UVI values are generally less than 1. Peak UVI values can exceed 20 in the tropics, where seasonal variations are much smaller. The highest values in the world occur in the high altitude altiplano region of Peru, where they can exceed UVI=25.
 
This app provides information about the current UVI and how it will vary throughout the day at any location. Sites can be selected by three methods: (1) GPS, (2) Drop-down menu of over 300 preloaded sites, (3) selection by touching the global map, using sliders to fine tune. Your own favourite locations can be specified and stored.
 
The app uses (a) daily ozone forecast maps provided by NOAA, (b) solar zenith angles calculated from location and time, (c) a look-up table to calculate the clear sky UVI as a function of ozone and solar zenith angle (SZA), (d) a digital elevation map to allow altitude corrections at other locations, (e) climatology of aerosol optical depth, (f) estimates of cloud effects at noon, and a (g) climatology map of monthly mean ozone as a function of latitude for estimating UV at other times.
 
The clear-sky UVI is first calculated for sea-level, assuming an Earth-Sun separation of 1 AU. Corrections are then applied to account for seasonal differences in Sun-Earth separation, altitude (including corrections to albedo due to estimated snow cover), and the climatological mean aerosol optical depth, and cloud effects for each location.
Initial outputs (portrait mode) are the calculated clear sky and UVI at the current time, and the time and value of peak UVI expected that day, along with behavioural messages that depend on the skin type entered. A world map shows the selected location and the current pattern of UVI for UVI > 3.
 
The second screen (landscape mode) goes into more detail, show plots of the progression in UVI throughout the day, with accompanying behavioural messages. The app displays parameters relevant to the calculation of UVI, and allows the capability to alter some of them to allow for local conditions, such as snow cover, heavier than usual pollution, or whether the sun is obscured by clouds.
 
The app includes a capability of estimating UVI at any location for other seasons. This is achieved by making use of a monthly climatology of ozone rather than the forecast values for the present day. This capability allows users to plan timing of visits to other destinations, or events at other locations. The UVI can be shown in Solar Time (longitude), Phone Time (at the current location), or GMT.
 
Acknowledgements: The app was developed by JGR Burke (jgrburke@gmail.com) in consultation with Dr Richard McKenzie, NIWA, Lauder, NZ. For further details ,see https://uv2go.files.wordpress.com/2016/01/calculation-of-uvi-for-smartphone-apps.pdf

recentChanges: Uses https rather than http to extract data from server.
comments: best uv app to use anywhere

Well done Jerry. As well as being invaluable for planning your day, this is also a great educational tool. You can play around with the inputs to see the importance of clouds, aerosols snow, etc. Making the ozone value available is also nice. By selecting different months, you can see how the UVI will vary on clear days in other seasons, anywhere in the world. Good for planning campaigns or holidays.

title: Breast Cancer Treatment Tips
description:
Breast Cancer Treatment, Breast Cancer is the cancer that develops in the breast tissues mostly in the inner lining of milk ducts or in the lobules which supply milk to the ducts. Depending on the place of origination, they are known as ductal carcinoma, if originated in the milk ducts or lobular carcinoma when originated in the lobules. Breast cancers are also classified as hormone-positive or a hormone-negative cancer which is decided based on their sensitivity to hormones like progesterone and estrogen.

App Feature:

- Will update more tips and content in the future.
- will adding tips and audio content, video for make you easier learning.

Read Why Learn Breast Cancer Treatment important:

The options available for breast cancer treatment depend on the type of breast cancer and the staging results. Staging is the process in which the disease spread and its progressive extend is determined. Though it is the most common non-skin type of cancer in women and is considered one of the fatal types of cancer, there are many advanced breast cancer treatment options which can help cure this disease if detected early.

Breast Cancer Treatment Plan

Once the cancer has been diagnosed, the doctors evaluate the pathology report and form a plan that would suit the type of cancer and the stage to which the disease has progressed. Treatment modes aim at reducing the spread of the disease, destruction of the diseased cells and reduction of chances for re-occurrence in future. The doctors would choose a single or a set of treatment options based on the patient's medical conditions which they may evaluate periodically.

Types of Breast cancer treatment methods

The treatments available are in general classified as standard methods and clinical trial methods. Standard methods are those that are currently practised for the cure of breast cancer while clinical trials are those that are currently being tested for more efficient results. The standard methods of breast cancer treatment include surgery, hormone therapy, chemotherapy, radiation treatments and targeted therapy.

Surgical method of Breast Cancer Treatment

Surgery is one potential option for removing the cancerous cells from the body. The entire breast or a partial portion of the breast is removed depending on the level of spread and the stage to which the disease has progressed.

More tips about this topics, you can download our app.

comments: It's great, the exercises are good and the customisation allows you to adjust it to your level and capabilities, although the ads might be quite annoying that's a good way to keep this as a free to use app. Also the water tracking is great, I always forget to drink water either bc I'm busy or I don't pay attention to it, this is quite helpful.

I have followed advance level workouts. I was in an intermittent fasting . And I stopped consuming any kind of sugars, Added sugars. 5 litter water every day. I am proud of myself. Thanks leap fitness. You guys can also do the same . Believe in yourself. And workout hard üí™.good luck

It is the best app for the people who want to lose body weight , I installed it and i saw results instantaniously. It keeps track of every thing like body weight each and every day it remindes me of drinking water and exercise. it only takes 20 minutes every morning to exercise. Only problem is ads the pop up when ever you close the app.

This is a pretty good app and i have used it multiple times so it has progressed very far. I find the animations nice but it would be better if you could see it with one extra perspective because before these wprkouts i have to check how to do each one beforehand. And ad placements have become much better so atleast i wont have an ad between a workout. Keep up the good work

I'm surprised. The Lose Weight App offers a decent workout routine. I've actually conducted military physical training on a daily basis for the last 17 years. This app is just as effective for a QUICK workout as long as you DO THE EXERCISES CORRECTLY. Don't cheat your body; take the appropriate break the app gives you, always do the full count or more and try to beat your record on timed exercises. If you do it right without skipping days you'll see results.

title: Super Slime Simulator: Satisfying ASMR & DIY Games
description:
Play with slime on your mobile device. Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like you would with real slime or goo. Enjoy that oddly satisfying feeling without the mess or sticky fingers!
With tons of slimes to choose from, this app is for slime noobs and pro slime veterans, young and old, boys and girls! You can even take animated pictures of your slime and share them with your friends using your favorite social media apps.

App features:

- Play with your simulated slime right on your phone.
- Realistic slime simulation: Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like real slime!
- Rich slime gallery: Gooey, fluffy, cheesy, glittering and many more.
- Introducing: Magical Slimes! Kids, don‚Äôt try to make these at home - because you can‚Äôt!
- The Ugliest & Yuckiest: Flesh, brains, worms and more - these WILL gross out your friends.
- Not all slimes were created equal: Unique texture, color and behavior for each slime.
- DIY! Create your very own slime. Choose from multiple materials, colors and even add glitter, foam and other amazing stuff.
- Fun area: enjoy great slime activities including: Guessing Game & Slime Painter.
- Shake it till you make it: Shake your phone to undo stretches.
- Oddly Satisfying Sounds: Turn up the volume and listen to your slime squishing as you touch it.
- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

FOLLOW US at
Instagram @superslimesimulator

comments: I love this app. The slimes realistic, and when you tap or drag the screen, the slime reacts as if it was a real slime. It is so satisfying that it makes me feel like I am actually touching slime. All the other mini-games are great too. There are so many ingredients to choose from. But it does take long to collect them. And I do not care about ads. People who complain about ads are impatient. I am yet to try Squishy Magic. Please add a thermochromic slime that changes color when touched.

This game is surprisingly awesome. Especially for those of you who are a fan of slime. I am a big fan of slime and I also enjoy making them so I love making, naming and choosing slime in this game even if you do it virtually. Just one thing, though, I noticed that one of the amazing prizes is very hard to get. Which is the thing I always hope most for. You will find out after playing this game. So what are you waiting for? Install this, right now!

This game is great! It teaches you the ingredients to how to make different slimes, and you get to actually play with the slime you made inside the game when you finish it! You have decorations and colors you can add to your slimes, and its easy to get slime types, colors, and decorations! This is super satysfying ASMR. Would i recommend this game? YES, DEFINETLY, ABSOLUTLY

I love it!! <3 Its super realistic and relaxing and it relieves my anxiety and stress everything is just so relaxing!!! I definitely recommend this to everyone its amazing and I love it you guys did a great job on this app its perfect! But one thing after playing with the game for a few minutes it gives you an ad but they're really easy to skip and there not that long :) ‚ô°‚ô°‚ô°

title: CircleDNA
description:
Unlock your DNA with Circle! The Circle Exome Series has been designed for those who take health and wellness seriously. Understand everything your genes can tell you about your:
‚Ä¢ Cancer risk
‚Ä¢ Disease risk
‚Ä¢ Family planning
‚Ä¢ Diet and nutrient needs
‚Ä¢ Skin
‚Ä¢ Stress & Sleep
+ many more!

Every test comes with a complimentary 30-min phone consultation with a genetics-trained health coach and/or a genetic counsellor. 

Use of services require purchasing a kit and submitting a saliva sample using the DNA Collection Kit provided. You can easily create an account, register your DNA kit, and track the progress of your sample. Once you get your results, open the app to see all your reports!

In the app, you can also:
‚Ä¢ Discover actionable insights that help you take control of your well-being so that you can live a happier, healthier life.
‚Ä¢ Get the latest scientific studies and resources.
‚Ä¢ Easily manage your family members in one account.

title: How To Cure Itchy Skin
description:
Itchy skin is an uncomfortable, irritating sensation that makes you want to scratch. Also known as pruritus (proo-RIE-tus), itchy skin can be caused or worsened by dry skin. It's common in older adults, as skin tends to become drier with age.

Depending on the cause of your itchy skin, it may appear normal, red, rough or bumpy. Repeated scratching can cause raised thick areas of skin that might bleed or become infected.

Many people find relief with self-care measures such as moisturizing daily, using gentle cleansers and bathing with lukewarm water. Long-term relief requires identifying and treating the cause of itchy skin. Common treatments are medicated lotions, moist dressings and oral anti-itch medicines.

title: X-plore File Manager
description:
Application manual: www.lonelycatgames.com/docs/xplore

Highlights:

‚óè Dual-pane tree view
‚óè Root, FTP, SMB1 / SMB2, Sqlite, Zip, Rar, 7zip, DLNA/UPnP explorer
‚óè Disk Map - see which files consume most space on your disk - http://bit.ly/xp-disk-map
‚óè Cloud storage access: Google Drive‚Ñ¢, Dropbox, Box, Amazon cloud drive, –û–ë–õ–ê–ö–û.mail.ru, Mega.co, OneDrive, Flickr, Webdav, Yandex.disk, MediaFire, Owncloud, SugarSync, GMX, Web.de
‚óè SSH File Transfer (SFTP) and SSH Shell - http://bit.ly/xp-sftp ***
‚óè Music player ***
‚óè App manager
‚óè USB OTG
‚óè PDF viewer
‚óè WiFi file sharing *** - http://bit.ly/xp-wifi-share
‚óè Manage files from a PC web browser *** - http://bit.ly/xp-wifi-web
‚óè Favorite folders
‚óè Built-in viewers for images, audio, text
‚óè Video player with subtitles ***
‚óè Batch rename
‚óè Hex viewer
‚óè Fast Image viewer with zoom and slide to previous/next images
‚óè Thumbnails for images and video as well as for various file types (depending on associated application)
‚óè Multi-selection - always available, yet not disturbing
‚óè View APK files as ZIP
‚óè Share - send files by Bluetooth, email, or whatever the device supports, from any location
‚óè Configurable buttons and key shortcuts
‚óè Seamless work with Zip (as if it was normal folder)
‚óè Vault for encrypting sensitive files - http://bit.ly/xp-vault *** 

*** marked features are paid - they require donation

X-plore allows you to see inside of your Android device. And also outside.

This is a dual-pane explorer, there are two folders shown at same time, and common operation such as copying files are done from one pane to another.
And X-plore shows folder hierarchy in a tree view for clear orientation and fast switching to other location.

You may explore internals of the device, and if you're power user and have your device rooted, you can make changes to system data - backup files, remove unwanted applications, etc.

If you're standard user, you may choose to hide internal memory from view and be sure not to mess with system.
You can comfortably see contents of mass memories on your device, or possibly attached USB memory stick.

Simple app manager allows to see, run, copy, share, uninstall and further explore installed applications.

WiFi file sharing
Access files on your Android device from other Android devices over WiFi.

Access from a PC web browser
Manage files on your Android device from your PC.

Access to FTP and FTPS (secure FTP) servers is supported.
Multiple servers may be configured.

X-plore can display shared folders on other computers in LAN.

X-plore can access various web storage "Cloud" servers, and access their files.
You need to have account in supported web service, then you can access your files stored online through X-plore.

Supported is also SSH File Transfer (SFTP) and Terminal shell emulator.

X-plore contains music player that can play music tracks from any available location.

With Vault function, you can encrypt sensitive files, even by your fingerprint.

Main operations are related to managing files and folders - viewing, copying, moving, deleting, compressing to Zip, extracting, renaming, sharing, and more.

SQLite database viewer
X-plore can show SQLite database files (those with .db extension) as expandable list of tables, each table containing list of rows and columns with database entries.

Main interaction is done by touch screen, clicking on folders or files to open files, or long-click to open context menu which contains options which can be done on particular clicked item, or multiple selected items.
Multi-selection allows to do operation on more files at once.

Opening file may mean to use one of built-in viewer for most popular file types: images, audio, video and text.
Or you may configure X-plore to use system application for opening files, in which case system-predefined application that can open particular file is launched.

Archives (currently supported are Zip, Rar and 7zip) are displayed as other folders.

comments: Paid user. Impressive design. Not easy to use early on but once you get the hang of it... One issue: Why do 'copy' and 'move' don't let me choose location? Am forced to use 'copy to clipboard' to Copy as well as Move a file. Please fix this or let me know if there is a workaround. Thanks. I read the manual. Exactly the same thing. Why can't it be simplified as in copy to destination of my choice directly?

Excellent app, many features and options, uniquely has dual panes, invaluable for organising files. Dual pane feature oddly disappeared a few weeks ago, but reinstated on new version - thanks Michal for very quick response to support query!

This has been my choice for best Android file manager for a long time. Great interface and amazing capabilities - can manipulate local, LAN, FTP, DNLA, and web-based files - pretty much anywhere you choose. I have used this app for some time on an unrooted Pixel 3, running Android 10, with great results. If it worked on Android 11, I'd give it a full 5 stars... however... The latest Android (11) update broke the file manager's ability (which worked fine in Android 10) to access (see or modify) anything in the InternalSharedStorage/Android/data folder (and others, I believe) - where Android apps store their data and files - at least on my unrooted phone. So, I'm no longer able to copy/delete/edit or even see files in the directory(-ies) whose permissions have apparently changed with the update. I understand that the developers of this app are not at fault here - that's clearly Google's screw up, but it definitely affects the suitability of the app for some uses, and users would want to know. In any case, if and when Google unscrews the pooch or the app developers can somehow overcome the issue, I'll com back and give the app the 5-stars that it would warrant. I'll send the developers a beer, via the app, since I had to dock them a star because of Google's mistake.

This Android file browser has been perfected over the years, making it practically perfect: an excellent interface, with well-placed buttons, fast in usage, and extensive support for dlna, usb, wifi and cloud storage. Nothing comes closer to a full-fledged desktop-experience. For a $3 donation you get some nice bonus features. Give the man some $! Thank you, maker.

Very interesting, indeed. I dont understand it and need somebody to help me understand this app and the process of it and what is the intent. Clever you are. Brilliant. So i like this app and been playing with it about apk files to the zip files. And now i guess im gonna do the tasker next with wifi. But why though? Why does this app need my wifi for. I really like it and been really busy with the app its fun but what are suppose to be doing

title: GLOW. Ovulation & Period Tracker
description:
Get pregnant, log your period cycle and more. Discover all the ovulation, period, fertility and pregnancy information you need with Glow.

Log your period in the app‚Äôs calendar and track your cycle with our ovulation calculator. 

Your period tracker lets you record ovulation, PMS, and pregnancy symptoms. Or log your period and be in control of your fertility with our period tracker and ovulation calendar. 

Fertility made easy - 5 ways Glow can work for you:

1. Get pregnant easily - Log 40 different health signals from sexual activity, mood swings, PMS and more.
2. Period tracker and ovulation calendar! Get personalized period information with our cycle chart, ovulation tracker and period calculator.
3. Fertility FAQS - Want to learn more about charting your fertility, egg freezing and menstrual health? Our library of "Glow Scoops" has all the articles you need to stay informed.
4. PMS or other symptoms? Log them all on your period calendar and find out what they mean.
5. Ovulation and all things pregnancy - Join our community to share your views and learn from other experiences. PMS, periods and pregnancy tips - no topic is off limits! 

Take control with Glow‚Äôs dedicated resources. From a dedicated ovulation tracker, PDF ovulation reports or even a fertility calculator. Get quality information you need to get pregnant or track your cycle. 

Whether you use Glow as an ovulation tracker or period calculator you will get unparalleled support. Trying to get pregnant naturally or undergoing IVF or IUI? Join the largest online community for women who are trying to conceive. Or get your partner to join our mirror app because fertility is a team sport! 

Want a period tracker or a women‚Äôs health app you can rely on for detail and accuracy? We‚Äôve got you covered. 

Download Glow today and take charge of your fertility.  

For full Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service:
https://glowing.com/privacy
https://glowing.com/tos

If you are having technical issues or have any questions about your cycle or period, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@glowing.com
